translation.en: [Optimus] We were once a peaceful race
of intelligent, mechanical beings.
But then came the war

translation.fr:
entre les Autobots,
qui se battaient pour la liberté

et les Decepticons,
qui rêvaient d'imposer leur tyrannie.

translation.en: Overmatched and outnumbered,
translation.fr:
Nous étions moins forts
et moins nombreux,

translation.en: our defeat was all but certain.
But in the war's final days,
one Autobot ship escaped the battle.
translation.fr:
un vaisseau autobot
traversa les lignes ennemies.

translation.en: It was carrying a secret cargo,
which would have changed our planet's fate.
translation.fr:
qui aurait pu bouleverser
le sort de notre planète.

translation.en: A desperate mission.
Our final hope.
A hope that vanished.
[man 1] One up there. One over there.
translation.fr: Un de plus ici, un là,

What you got?
[man 2] Impact detected.
We have impact confirmed.
Contact at 2250 GMT.

22h50 GMT. DIRECTEUR DE LA NASA
LANGLEY, VIRGINIE

translation.en: What?
Get me SecDef on the phone right away.

[McNamara] Mr. President, designation, top secret. We believe a UFO has crashed into the moon.

translation.en: We think the Russians are onto it as well.
translation.fr:
Les Russes
sont peut-être aussi sur le coup.

translation.en: Well, then you tell NASA to move heaven and earth. We need to get to the moon.

Que la NASA remue ciel et terre,
nous devons y aller.

translation.en: [McNamara] We're going to attempt a manned mission.

translation.en: NASA said it would take five years.

translation.en: You get there before the Russians.

translation.en: [Kennedy] I believe that this nation should commit itself

before this decade is out,

à envoyer un homme sur la Lune
et à le ramener sur Terre.

Five, four, three...
All engines running.
Liftoff. We have a liftoff.
Thirty-two minutes past the hour. Liftoff on Apollo 11.
Neil Armstrong reporting Apollo 11 on proper heading.
Apollo 11 is on the way,
riding that pillar of flame
from the Saturn V out there, 250,000 miles away,
where the moon is waiting
for man's first arrival.
Houston, you're a go for landing. Over.

Vous êtes go pour alunissage.
Terminé.

40 pieds, deux et demi en descente.

30 pieds, deux et demi en descente.

Contact light.
Okay, engine stop.
[Neil] Houston,
Tranquility Base here.

de l'événement
le plus marquant de notre époque

que le contact est rompu

Non monsieur,

translation.en: I mean, they were very kind to me, found me in a jiffy.
translation.fr:
Ils ont été très gentils.
Ils m'ont trouvé en un clin d'œil.

translation.en: And that's all been expunged. Obama gave me a medal, actually.
I'm just saying. It's always good to have a medal guy in the office, with a medal.
translation.fr:
Ça peut servir au bureau,
un gars qui a une médaille.

translation.en: -From Obama? -Yeah.
In this office, we're mostly Republicans, so...
translation.fr: On est plutôt républicains, ici. Alors...

translation.en: I'm not feeling too good. -No? -No.
translation.fr: Je me sens pas très bien.

translation.en: Why don't you get a little dipping tray and dip the dog in Pepto? That's a solution.
translation.fr:
T'as qu'à tremper ton hot-dog
dans du bicarbonate.

translation.en: Pow. I got another one. We got to go.
-Come on. -Really?
Sit.
Got myself a Mr. Sam Witwicky, recent college graduate.
translation.fr:
Je me retrouve avec un M. Witwicky,
tout juste sorti de fac,

translation.en: Previous experience, next to zero,
yet he has a recommend letter from our board?
translation.fr:
il est recommandé
par le conseil d'administration !

translation.en: WTF to that.
Do I know somebody on your board?
Here's the deal. You know who we are. Accuretta Systems, global leader in telecom,
translation.fr:
Accuretta Systems est leader mondial
des télécoms et de l'aérospatiale

translation.en: aerospace, 17 billion in profit last year.
We contract for DARPA, NASA, JPL, you name it.
translation.fr:
Nous travaillons pour la DARPA,
la NASA, le JPL etc.

translation.en: You perform here, doors open for you anywhere.
translation.fr:
Faites vos preuves ici,
les portes s'ouvriront.

translation.en: First job out of college is critical, kid.
translation.fr:
Le premier poste après la fac
est crucial.

translation.en: You either take a step down the correct career path,
translation.fr:
Soit on s'engage
sur la voie de la réussite,

translation.en: -or you fall into a life-sucking abyss. -Hmm.
translation.fr:
soit on sombre dans un abysse
d'angoisse à perpétuité.

translation.en: So, it all depends on how you respond to my next two words:
translation.fr:
Tout va dépendre de votre réaction
à ces deux mots :

translation.en: Impress me.
-Now? -Impress me.
You catch me off guard. -I don't know where to begin. -Impress me.
translation.fr:
- Vous me prenez de court...
- Épatez-moi.

translation.en: I'm an open book. Ask me any question you like.
-So you're a go-getter, ramrod... -Yes, sir. ...take-charge kind of guy?
translation.fr:
Vous avez les dents longues,
vous êtes un meneur ?

translation.en: I'm a killer. A stone-cold killer.
translation.fr: Je suis un tueur. Au sang froid.

translation.en: So, take-charge guy?
Take-charge, Viking, barbarian, of course, that's me.
translation.fr:
- Meneur...
- Meneur, Viking, barbare. Bien sûr. C'est tout moi.

translation.en: Pow! I'm here.
We are not looking for that here.
translation.fr: Ce n'est pas ce qu'on recherche.

translation.en: No brown-nosing. No suck up. No toolery. I--
translation.fr:
Ni cireur de pompes,
ni lécheur de bottes, ni frimeur...

translation.en: [secretary] Yes, Mr. Brazos.
Why is Shontel using what appears to be a red cup
translation.fr:
Pourquoi Shontel boit-elle
dans une tasse visiblement rouge

translation.en: from the red floor
translation.fr:
alors que nous sommes
à l'étage jaune ?

translation.en: -when we are on the yellow floor? -I'm on it.
translation.fr:
alors que nous sommes
à l'étage jaune ? Je m'en occupe.

translation.en: It is a visual, and, therefore, a visceral betrayal.
translation.fr:
C'est une trahison visuelle
et par conséquent, viscérale.

translation.en: Stop it!
Such a dumbass.
-[Brazos] Disgusting! -[whimpers]
Thank you!
It's total anarchy around here.
The e-mail I read said administrative aide?
Nope. Mailroom.
I'm gonna go.
Do you have any idea how many Ivy League Phi Beta Kappas would kill to--
translation.fr:
Vous savez combien d'élites
des meilleures facs tueraient...

translation.en: Mister, I saved your life twice. Okay?
translation.fr:
Monsieur,
je vous ai sauvé la vie deux fois.

translation.en: I can't tell you how, or when, or why,
translation.fr:
Je ne peux vous dire
ni comment ni quand,

translation.en: but I have done shit that matters, and I'd just kind of like a job where I matter again.
translation.fr:
mais je veux un travail
dans lequel on a besoin de moi.

translation.en: So thank you, but, no, thank you, okay?
You know what I think? You want the job after this job.
translation.fr:
À mon avis,
vous voulez le poste au-dessus

translation.en: But, son, this is the job that's standing in your way.
translation.fr: mais ce poste-ci vous barre la route,

translation.en: And that's why you're gonna be so very, very good at it.
translation.fr: donc vous allez vous donner à fond.

translation.en: 'Cause when I look at you, I see a younger me.
translation.fr: J'étais comme vous, à votre âge.

translation.en: [man, over PA] All arriving Autobots, in par, training and debriefing in 15 minutes.
translation.fr:
À tous les Autobots, entraînement
et débriefing dans 15 minutes.

translation.en: Dino, report to Bay 23.
Sideswipe, Bay 37 for weapons assessment.
[Mearing] Senator, I suggest you remember that when the NSA wants funding, they call me.
translation.fr:
Sénateur, sachez que la NSA
m'appelle pour ses subventions.

translation.en: When the CIA is gonna take out a target, they ask first for my permission.
translation.fr:
La CIA me demande la permission
pour éliminer une cible.

translation.en: And when the President wants to know which members of Congress are politically vulnerable
translation.fr:
Quand le Président veut savoir
qui au Congrès

translation.en: in terms of, let's say, undiscovered criminal conduct,
translation.fr:
est rendu vulnérable
par des actes illégaux non révélés,

translation.en: I'm the number he dials.
[newscaster, on TV] U.S. agencies say they have been monitoring the blast.
translation.fr:
Les agences américaines
ont suivi l'explosion,

translation.en: But if, in fact, this was a covert military strike,
translation.fr:
mais s'il s'agit
d'une opération secrète...

translation.en: CIA is up my ass about this mystery raid in the Middle East.
translation.fr:
La CIA me tanne
au sujet du raid mystère.

translation.en: So, it's time to come clean. Was your unit involved?
translation.fr:
Soyez franc.
Votre unité est-elle impliquée ?

translation.en: Uh, I'm not sure, ma'am.
All right, guys. This is how you do a Decepticon head kill shot.
translation.fr:
C'est comme ça qu'on fait un headshot
sur un Decepticon.

translation.en: As Director of National Intelligence, I'm a really big fan of intelligent answers.
translation.fr:
Je dirige le Renseignement,
j'aime qu'on me renseigne.

translation.en: I can't really tell you definitively.
These Autobots are like teenage kids. They like to sneak out of the house every once in a while.
translation.fr:
Les Autobots sont comme des ados,
ils fuguent.

translation.en: Colonel Lennox, are you in command or are you not? Yes, ma'am, I am.
translation.fr:
- Vous commandez ou pas ?
- Oui, madame...

translation.en: Stop with the "ma'am." Enough with the "ma'am." Do I look like a "ma'am"?
translation.fr:
Arrêtez avec vos "madame",
j'ai l'air d'une "madame" ?

translation.en: No, ma'am. Yes, ma'am. Yes.
This gun is my perfect invention, Ironhide. Right.
translation.fr:
Cette arme
est ma plus belle invention.

translation.en: Oh, good, you're here!
Me name's Que.
I do hope you have answers for him. I've never seen him so upset.
translation.fr:
Vous avez ses réponses ?
Je l'ai jamais vu comme ça.

translation.en: Optimus, you remember Charlotte Mearing?
Our Director of National Intelligence?
He's in a bad mood. He's not talking to anybody today.
translation.fr: Il est de mauvais poil. Il parle à personne.

translation.en: What is this, the silent treatment?
translation.fr: Ça veut dire quoi ? Il boude ?

translation.en: -We've seen that and this is not that. -Definitely not.
translation.fr: On l'a déjà vu bouder, c'est pas ça.

translation.en: This is worse.
Prime! Make something of yourself!
He's pissed.
You lied to us.
Everything humans know of our planet we were told had all been shared.
translation.fr:
Vous deviez partager
vos informations sur notre planète.

translation.en: So why was this found in human possession?
We were in the dark on this, also. It was Director Only clearance at Sector 7 until now.
translation.fr:
Cette information n'était connue
que du directeur du S7.

translation.en: The bag.
-[whispers] Which bag? -Hermes. Birkin. Green ostrich!
translation.fr: Quel sac ? Hermès, Birkin, cuir d'autruche, vert.

translation.en: Oh, my God.
This is a secret few men knew, and fewer still remain alive.
translation.fr:
Peu de gens connaissaient ce secret.
Très peu vivent encore.

translation.en: Allow me to please introduce to you
two of NASA's founding mission directors, and astronaut, Dr. Buzz Aldrin,
translation.fr:
deux directeurs de mission de la NASA
et l'astronaute Buzz Aldrin,

translation.en: one of the first two men to step foot on the moon.
translation.fr:
l'un des deux premiers hommes
sur la Lune.

translation.en: Sir? Optimus Prime.
From a fellow space traveler, it's a true honor.
translation.fr:
En tant que voyageur de l'espace,
c'est un honneur.

translation.en: The honor is mine.
Our entire space race of the 1960s, it appears, was in response to an event.
translation.fr:
La course à l'espace des années 60
avait été provoquée par un événement.

translation.en: Our astronauts investigated a crashed alien ship.
translation.fr:
Nos astronautes ont inspecté
l'épave d'un vaisseau alien.

translation.en: No survivors onboard.
We were sworn to secrecy by our commander-in-chief.
translation.fr: Nous avions juré de garder le secret.

translation.en: This was a mission you will never speak of.
translation.fr: Cette mission ne devra jamais être évoquée.

translation.en: I understand, sir.
A total of 35 people knew the real plan at NASA.
translation.fr:
En tout, 35 personnes connaissaient
le véritable projet à la NASA.

translation.en: Soviets managed to land unmanned probes.
translation.fr:
Les Soviétiques
avaient envoyé des sondes.

translation.en: Somehow they must have picked up that fuel rod.
translation.fr:
Ils ont récupéré
ce barreau de combustible.

translation.en: We believe the Russians deduced that the rod was a fissionable fuel assembly,
translation.fr:
Les Soviétiques ont déduit
qu'il s'agissait d'une matière fissile

translation.en: believed they had it mastered, and tried to harness it at Chernobyl.
translation.fr: et ils l'ont utilisée à Tchernobyl.

translation.en: We landed six missions in all.
We took hundreds of photos and samples.
translation.fr:
Nous avons des photos
et des prélèvements.

translation.en: We locked them away forever, and the moon program was shut down.
translation.fr:
Tout a été mis sous scellé
et le programme lunaire a pris fin.

translation.en: Well, did you search the crash vault?
The ship's name was the Ark.
I watched it escape Cybertron myself.
It was carrying an Autobot technology which would have won us the war
translation.fr:
Il transportait une technologie
qui nous aurait fait gagner la guerre...

translation.en: and its captain.
Who was its captain?
The great Sentinel Prime, the technology's inventor.
translation.fr:
Le grand Sentinel Prime,
l'inventeur de cette technologie.

translation.en: He was commander of the Autobots before me.
translation.fr: Il commandait les Autobots avant moi.

translation.en: It's imperative that I find it before the decepticons learn of its location.
translation.fr:
Il faut absolument que je le trouve
avant les Decepticons.

translation.en: Our Autobot spacecraft has the ability to get there.
translation.fr:
Notre navette autobot
a la capacité de faire ce voyage.

translation.en: And you must pray it's in time.
translation.fr: Priez pour que j'arrive à temps.

translation.en: Hi. I'm here to see Carly Spencer.
translation.fr: Bonjour, je viens voir Carly Spencer.

translation.en: Carly!
[Carly] Sorry, just gotta...
-You got the job? -This is crazy.
-You really got it? -Yes. See, what did I tell you? It's the bunny.
translation.fr:
Tu l'as vraiment eu ?
Tu vois, c'est grâce au lapin.

translation.en: You are so welcome.
Do you like me more? A little bit, yeah.
translation.fr:
- Je te plais un peu plus ?
- Un peu.

translation.en: You said you were his assistant curator, you didn't say the guy owns Space Mountain.
translation.fr:
Tu gères une collection
dans Space Mountain ?

translation.en: I know. Isn't it beautiful in here?
And he's the coolest guy. Ever.
translation.fr:
Et mon patron est trop cool.
Vraiment.

translation.en: -[Sam] Yeah? -[Carly] Yeah.
Sam.
Dylan Gould.
Hey. A pleasure to meet you.
Pleasure meeting you. Carly's told me a lot about you.
translation.fr:
C'est moi.
Carly m'a beaucoup parlé de vous.

translation.en: Well, vice versa. It's a beautiful building you got. It's like the Starship Enterprise in here.
translation.fr:
Également. Il est beau ce bâtiment,
on dirait l'Enterprise.

translation.en: [chuckles] Thank you very much. It leaks.
Before Carly came to help run the collection, it was just a complete mess.
translation.fr:
Avant l'arrivée de Carly,
c'était un désastre.

translation.en: But now, the restorations are back on track.
We're going to Pebble Beach this year, and we're gonna get a trophy for that stand right there.
translation.fr:
et on aura bientôt un trophée
à ajouter ici.

translation.en: You know why? Because this woman right here
translation.fr: Vous savez pourquoi ? Parce que cette femme...

translation.en: -is my secret weapon. -[Sam] Okay.
Mr. Gould, please, you exaggerate.
translation.fr:
M. Gould, arrêtez, je ne fais que gérer
l'organisation.

translation.en: All I've done is get you organized.
translation.fr:
arrêtez, je ne fais que gérer
l'organisation.

translation.en: You've done much more than that, my Duchess.
translation.fr: Vous faites bien plus, ma duchesse.

translation.en: Nicknames, that's fun.
Yeah. The Duchess.
She's adorable.
You know, when I stole her away from the British Embassy,
translation.fr:
Quand elle travaillait à l'ambassade,
je lui ai dit :

translation.en: I said, "It's easy to manage a country. Try managing a priceless collection of art."
translation.fr:
"Facile de gérer un pays.
Essayez une collection d'art."

translation.en: Take a look at this 1939 Delahaye 165 Cabriolet.
translation.fr:
Regardez ce modèle de 1939,
une Delahaye type 165.

translation.en: Designed by a Frenchman.
Look at the curves. Elegant, isn't it? Beautiful.
translation.fr:
Regardez ces courbes.
Elégante, non ? Belle.

translation.en: Sensual.
Built to evoke the body of the ideal woman.
translation.fr: C'est le corps de la femme idéale.

translation.en: My dad had a ten dollar desk and a dream,
translation.fr:
Mon père avait un bureau à 10 dollars
et un rêve,

translation.en: and he built it into an empire.
translation.fr: dont il a fait un empire.

translation.en: [Dylan] We're the largest accounting firm in the U.S.
translation.fr:
Ce cabinet comptable
est le plus gros du pays.

translation.en: I started up the venture side after he passed. Invest in the future.
translation.fr:
Je me suis lancé après son décès.
J'investis sur l'avenir.

translation.en: Try and bet on the winners.
See, collecting cars helps me keep my sanity.
translation.fr:
Les voitures
m'empêchent de devenir dingue.

translation.en: You guys look great.
That was a great day, Mr. Gould.
-I haven't seen that one. -No. Me, neither.
translation.fr:
- Je ne l'avais pas vue.
- Moi non plus.

translation.en: -[Dylan] Jeans are tight. -[Sam exhales]
Here we go. Here we go. You see that?
translation.fr:
Et voilà. Il me juge.
Il juge un homme à sa voiture !

translation.en: Judgment. Judging a man by his car?
translation.fr:
Il me juge.
Il juge un homme à sa voiture !

translation.en: And you're gonna wave at him while he's judging me?
translation.fr: Et toi, tu lui fais signe ?

translation.en: [Carly] What's with you? He's my boss. This job pays for our food, our rent.
translation.fr:
C'est mon patron !
Ce travail nous permet de manger.

translation.en: [Sam] No, I totally understand. I'm totally fine. I get it. I'm well fed.
translation.fr:
Je comprends.
Ça va, je suis bien nourri.

translation.en: And guess what? I'm not your boy toy anymore. I got my big boy pants on. You see them?
translation.fr:
Je suis plus ton toy boy.
J'ai un vrai pantalon.

translation.en: In the car. Thank you, Duchess.
Oh, my God. Are you threatened by him?
Threatened? What am I threatened by? His money? His power? His good looks?
translation.fr:
Peur de quoi ?
Son argent ? Sa belle gueule ?

translation.en: None of the above. Check!
translation.fr: Ni l'un ni l'autre. Affaire réglée.

translation.en: God! Your temper tantrums are so sexy.
translation.fr: Tu es sexy quand tu t'énerves.

translation.en: Get in the car, please.
Sam, he's hardly the first man to ever smile at me. -I think I can handle it. -Hold on, hold on.
translation.fr: Il n'est pas le premier à me sourire.

translation.en: It's the smiling back part that gets me. Okay?
translation.fr: Quand toi tu lui souris, j'aime pas.

translation.en: No more smiles. Never again. I promise.
-That works for me. -Yeah?
Easy! Easy! You're not gonna get it started that way.
translation.fr:
Doucement !
Elle démarrera pas comme ça.

translation.en: Well, I was just getting it ready. I'm about 32% done with my restoration.
translation.fr:
Je la retape.
Elle est restaurée à 32 %.

translation.en: Some chrome work, put a spoiler on the back. Done deal.
translation.fr: Il manque les chromes et le spoiler.

translation.en: You know, Carly's been telling me you've been struggling job-wise.
translation.fr:
Carly m'a parlé
de votre recherche d'emploi.

translation.en: Just so you know,
I'm on the board for Accuretta Systems, and I put in a call for you.
translation.fr:
pour Accuretta Systems,
j'ai parlé pour vous.

translation.en: Let's keep it between us, okay? She's so proud of you.
translation.fr: Ça reste entre nous ? Elle est si fière de vous.

translation.en: You're a lucky man.
[Optimus] Xanthium approaching Tranquility Base.
translation.fr:
Xanthium en approche
sur la base de la Tranquillité.

translation.en: [man 1] You're a go for landing.
translation.fr: Houston, vous êtes go pour l'atterrissage.

translation.en: Ratchet, let's roll.
[Optimus] We're entering the Ark.
His levels are faint.
He locked himself away to guard the pillars.
translation.fr:
Il s'est enfermé
pour protéger les piliers.

translation.en: Sentinel.
You're coming home, old friend.
translation.fr: Nous vous emmenons, mon vieil ami.

translation.en: [Megatron] All hail Megatron.
[giggling] My master! Yes, master!
Oh, don't be greedy, my fragile ones.
translation.fr: Ne soyez pas voraces, mes tout petits.

translation.en: My poor master.
How it pains me to see you so wounded, so weak.
translation.fr:
Comme je souffre
de vous voir si meurtri et si faible !

translation.en: Spare me, you gaseous sycophant!
You know what you are told, which is nothing.
translation.fr:
Tu ne sais que ce qu'on te dit,
ce qui est peu.

translation.en: Soundwave reporting, Lord Megatron.
And what news from your little assassin?
translation.fr:
Quelles sont les nouvelles
de ton petit assassin ?

translation.en: Autobots have taken the bait.
translation.fr: Les Autobots ont mordu à l'hameçon.

translation.en: They've discovered the Ark and returned with its cargo.
translation.fr:
Ils ont découvert l'Arche
et ont rapporté son chargement.

translation.en: You did me great honor tracking that ship to the moon.
translation.fr:
Tu m'as bien servi
en retrouvant ce vaisseau sur la Lune.

translation.en: Your human collaborators have served their purpose, Soundwave.
translation.fr:
Nous n'avons plus besoin
de tes collaborateurs humains.

translation.en: It's time to eliminate loose ends.
translation.fr: Il est temps de régler ce détail.

translation.en: [Soundwave] Laserbeak, kill them all.
[Laserbeak] With pleasure.
Is your daddy home?
translation.fr: Ton papa est à la maison ?

translation.en: -[girl] "Then Madeline said..." -[woman] Madeline!
translation.fr:
- Et Madeline a dit qu'il est temps...
- Madeline !

translation.en: Hello, Mom.
[woman] Get out of the house!
What are you doing in my house? [Laserbeak] Just visiting.
translation.fr:
- Que faites-vous ici ?
- Une petite visite.

translation.en: What is this hoochie-mama outfit?
translation.fr: Vous vous croyez à la plage ?

translation.en: No, this is the aerospace division, okay? We do not allow that here!
New guy! You see that? That's a Latin meltdown, okay?
You ever show up in my office with a hoochie-mama outfit, you're fired.
translation.fr: Si tu t'habilles comme ça, t'es viré.

translation.en: You got that? Okay, you're gonna be on this cart
translation.fr:
T'as vu ça ? Tu vas garder ce chariot 2 ans.
Aime-le, donne-lui un nom.

translation.en: for two-and-a-half years, okay? I want you to live it, love it, and name it.
translation.fr:
Tu vas garder ce chariot 2 ans.
Aime-le, donne-lui un nom.

translation.en: There's no ladder-climbing in my office. I run a tight ship. Okay?
translation.fr:
- Pas de piston, ici. Je veille au grain.
- Oui, monsieur.

translation.en: -Yes, sir. -Move!
I found that paper I was telling you about.
translation.fr: J'ai le papier dont je t'ai parlé.

translation.en: -What are we looking at? -Shut up!
You do that to me again, and I'll kick your ass!
translation.fr: Tu me refais ça, je t'éclate.

translation.en: -Hi. -[chuckles]
Hi, angel.
-How are you? -Good.
I had a meeting downtown. Was it okay for me to stop by?
translation.fr: J'ai le droit de venir te voir ici ?

translation.en: I don't know. My 500-page employee conduct manual isn't exactly a page turner.
translation.fr:
Je sais pas. J'ai pas lu
les 500 pages du règlement.

translation.en: This is great.
Yeah, Autobots are off saving the world, and I have organized four binders. I'm living the dream. Come on.
translation.fr:
Les Autobots sauvent le monde
et je range des classeurs. Le rêve.

translation.en: Visitor violation.
You okay?
Absolutely.
I'm next.
Listen. Saturday. Dylan's throwing a party at his house.
translation.fr:
Écoute. Samedi, Dylan donne une fête.
C'est pour le boulot, mais il t'invite.

translation.en: It's a work thing, but he's invited you, too.
translation.fr:
Samedi, Dylan donne une fête.
C'est pour le boulot, mais il t'invite.

translation.en: -Oh, did he? -I want you to come and laugh at my bad jokes.
translation.fr:
Vraiment ? Viens rire à mes blagues.
C'est important pour moi.

translation.en: It would really mean a lot to me, okay?
translation.fr:
Viens rire à mes blagues.
C'est important pour moi.

translation.en: I'd love to go. How'd you get over here?
-Car. -You don't have a car.
Yes, I do.
What, did you win it in a raffle?
translation.fr: Tu l'as eue à la loterie ?

translation.en: Uh, he gave me one.
He gave you a car? Yeah, I think it was a work perk.
translation.fr:
- Il t'a donné une voiture ?
- C'est une prime.

translation.en: Huh. A work perk.
What kind of car did he give you?
-A Mercedes SLS AMG. -Mm-hmm. [typing]
Really throaty engine.
[woman] Mercedes-Benz SLS
-combines breathtaking performance... -You drove this here? [sighs]
That's a $200,000 car.
[whispering] I know.
You know how long it would take me to afford a car like this?
translation.fr:
Tu sais en combien de temps
je gagne ça ?

translation.en: -A long time? -Yeah, like 53 years.
He said it was for both of us. Then what we should do is, we should sell it and buy a house.
translation.fr:
- C'est pour nous deux.
- On la vend, on achète une maison.

translation.en: You're frustrated, I know. I've been there.
translation.fr:
Tu es frustré, je sais.
Je connais ça.

translation.en: It's called paying your dues. Good things will happen.
translation.fr: Ça s'appelle faire ses preuves. Ça s'arrangera.

translation.en: Ladies and gentlemen,
I need some lunch time filing done, stat.
translation.fr: j'ai du classement urgent pour vous.

translation.en: Who would like to score some Bruce Brazos points?
translation.fr:
Qui veut marquer des points
auprès de M. Brazos ?

translation.en: Bruce, you found your guy.
Witwicky!
The man who makes this company run.
translation.fr: Cette société repose sur vos épaules.

translation.en: Now, who have we here?
Is it a sister, Facebook friend, Twitter tweeter?
translation.fr:
Sœur, amie Facebook,
tweeteuse de Twitter ?

translation.en: -Carly, this is Bruce. Bruce. -Hi.
I'm his girlfriend. A pleasure to meet you.
translation.fr: Je suis sa petite amie. Enchantée.

translation.en: Sam was right. You really do have a smashing head of hair.
Well, thank you.
-Sam, I got to run. -Yeah.
Here, your present.
Your favorite color.
-Nice to meet you, Mr. Brazos. -And you.
translation.fr:
- C'était un plaisir, M. Brazos.
- Pour moi aussi.

translation.en: See you, boys.
I'm still stewing about that binder incident, Jerry.
translation.fr: Le coup du classeur, je l'ai en travers.

translation.en: May I finish my Shuhua milk, Donny?
translation.fr: Je peux finir mon lait Shuhua, Donny ?

translation.en: I don't care about your exotic milk. I care about respect!
translation.fr:
Je me fous de ton lait exotique,
je te parle de respect.

translation.en: I know who you are!
Witwicky! Witwicky!
-I'm talking to you! -Excuse me. Thank you.
Whoa, whoa, whoa. Slow down, tiger.
You showed up in the background of six different photos, two continents, with aliens.
translation.fr:
On te voit sur 6 photos
et 2 continents avec des aliens.

translation.en: That was you in Egypt, huh, right? Because you know the aliens.
translation.fr: C'était toi en Égypte, hein ? Tu connais les aliens.

translation.en: Give me my jacket!
I'm Wang. Deep Wang. Deep Wang.
You're not getting it. Deep Throat.
Watergate? I'm talking code to you... Shh!
translation.fr:
Le Watergate !
Je parle en code, là.

translation.en: Damn it. Shh!
They watch and listen.
I can't go to the government, but you can.
translation.fr:
J'ai pas accès au gouvernement
mais toi, si.

translation.en: Because shit's going down, son! It is Code Pink, as in Floyd.
translation.fr:
Il se passe des choses.
Code Pink, comme les Floyd.

translation.en: Dark Side. Why do you think no one's been up there since 1972?
translation.fr:
L'album "Dark Side".
On n'y va plus depuis 72.

translation.en: I know you're speaking English, I just...
translation.fr:
On parle la même langue
mais je comprends rien.

translation.en: It's a very strange English. That's why I'm not--
translation.fr:
On parle la même langue
mais je comprends rien. C'est pour ça que je ne...
Oh...

translation.en: Don't. I'm gonna hit you.
translation.fr: Si tu fais ça, je te tape.

translation.en: I'm gonna hit you right back, son.
translation.fr: Et moi, je te le rends.

translation.en: It's my manifesto.
They're whacking us out, everyone who knows what's on the dark--
translation.fr:
Ils exterminent
ceux qui savent ce qu'il y a...

translation.en: Your alien friends are in danger, you know, the good ones. It's up to you.
translation.fr:
Tes amis aliens sont en danger.
À toi de voir.

translation.en: [Jerry] Calm down.
Easy, Sam!
What are you looking at?
Yo, dawg.
Are you up in my shit? Who are you working for?
translation.fr: Tu me cherches ? Tu bosses pour qui ?

translation.en: Staredown, you and me.
translation.fr: Tu baisses les yeux, t'as perdu.

translation.en: Guess I won.
Moon satellites.
The Russian space program.
Experts dead.
Space program ends.
Dark side... Dark side of the moon.
translation.fr: La face cachée de la Lune.

translation.en: Look what I found outside the bathroom. Is it yours?
translation.fr:
C'était aux toilettes.
C'est à toi ?

translation.en: Deal with this. Yes, sir.
I did everything you want!
I really think we should talk, 'cause some of the stuff--
Whoa! Knock first!
Can't you see I'm busy?
Who are you? Who are you?
You straddled me in the stall.
That's happened to me once in this life. I wouldn't forget it.
translation.fr:
C'est pas le genre de chose
qu'on oublie.

translation.en: -I don't know. -From the bathroom stall. You took your package out.
We are not boyfriends, okay?
One phone call from me and I'll have you fired.
translation.fr:
Je passe un coup de fil
et t'es viré !

translation.en: Oh, yes, I will, gaylord!
-[Jerry screaming] -Are you okay?
Hemorrhoids!
Should I come back? When should I come back? Come back when you learn some manners!
translation.fr:
- Je peux repasser quand ?
- Quand tu seras mieux élevé.

translation.en: I don't know him! I would never say anything!
translation.fr:
Je le connais pas.
Je lui dirais jamais rien.

translation.en: Okay, okay! I sabotaged the mapping satellite, just like I promised, I can put a blind spot in the program as a bonus.
translation.fr:
J'ai saboté le satellite de cartographie
et mis un point aveugle...

translation.en: What more do you want from me?
Jerry, you are my favorite.
I'll do whatever you want me to do.
translation.fr:
- Je ferai ce que vous voudrez.
- Je sais.

translation.en: I know, but my superiors need me to...
translation.fr:
- Je ferai ce que vous voudrez.
- Je sais. Mais mes supérieurs veulent que je...

translation.en: ...suicide you.
translation.fr:
- Ne faites pas ça.
- te suicide.

translation.en: What did you say to Witwicky?
Oh, shit!
Huh? Who wants some chicken dinner now, bitch?
translation.fr: Y a du poulet au menu, ce soir !

translation.en: 'Cause somebody messed with the wrong Wang today!
translation.fr: Fallait pas chercher le mauvais Wang !

translation.en: Come on! You want some of me?
No, no, no!
I don't need any more didactic lectures from Chuck.
translation.fr:
Je refuse d'entendre Chuck
me faire la leçon.

translation.en: -[screaming] -Jesus!
[Brazos] Get legal.
That's Jerry!
Come on, people. Yes, a workmate died, but looking out the window is not going to bring him back.
translation.fr:
C'est bon, votre collègue est mort.
Restez pas aux fenêtres.

translation.en: The man was depressed.
Don't take a picture!
You can keep watching him, but he's not getting up.
translation.fr:
Vous pouvez continuer à le regarder,
il va pas se relever.

translation.en: You all read "Humpty Dumpty." Okay?
translation.fr:
Vous pouvez continuer à le regarder,
il va pas se relever. OK ? Witwicky...

translation.en: Witwicky.
I'm spearheading the press. You clean up.
translation.fr:
Je gère la presse
et vous, le nettoyage.

translation.en: Wang is everywhere. He is in the bistro.
translation.fr: Il y a du Wang partout. Au bistrot,

translation.en: He's in the bamboo. He's on the balustrade.
translation.fr: dans les bambous, sur la balustrade.

translation.en: You see the sidewalk down there? [chuckles] Man!
translation.fr:
Vous avez vu le trottoir !
La vache !

translation.en: Box up his personals. Get his name off his parking space.
translation.fr:
Emballez ses affaires.
Enlevez son nom du parking.

translation.en: [man] Hey, when did we get a new copier?
Listen, I'm not gonna say anything about what I saw.
translation.fr: Je ne dirai pas ce que j'ai vu.

translation.en: Who you share a toilet stall with is totally your business.
translation.fr:
Vous faites ce que vous voulez
aux toilettes.

translation.en: This is exceedingly Japanese.
They never make it easy, do they?
[Carly] What is with you?
[Sam] This is the real deal, Carly, okay? I need you to stay composed. It's real life. I'll explain it to you later.
translation.fr:
C'est du sérieux, Carly.
Reste zen, je t'expliquerai.

translation.en: We've got an emergency. You gotta get Colonel Lennox out here. I'm reporting a Decepticon. The Decepticons are back. You gotta open that gate right now.
translation.fr:
Appelez le colonel Lennox.
Les Decepticons reviennent. Ouvrez.

translation.en: Easy, sir. This is Health and Human Services.
translation.fr: Ici, c'est le ministère de la Santé.

translation.en: Right. Packing M4s? What are you protecting, colostomy bags?
translation.fr:
Avec des M4 ?
Vous protégez les anus artificiels ?

translation.en: -Bedpans? Throat lozenges? -[Carly] Babe...
Where'd you get that hat from, nursing school? So, you're nurses and foot-powder protectors?
translation.fr:
C'est une casquette d'infirmier ?
Vous protégez le talc ?

translation.en: -I don't think we're in the right place. -We are in the right place.
translation.fr:
- On n'est pas au bon endroit.
- Si, c'est là.

translation.en: We're in the right place, and I'm gonna talk to Optimus right now. -You're gonna get Optimus out here. -Sir.
translation.fr:
Je veux parler à Optimus.
Faites-le venir.

translation.en: You got the wrong building. I don't know what you're talking about.
What part of "Decepticons are back" do you not understand?
translation.fr:
Les Decepticons sont là,
c'est clair.

translation.en: [bangs car] Yo! You being a smartass?
Do not hit my car! It's a collector's item!
translation.fr:
Touchez pas ma voiture !
Elle est ancienne.

translation.en: I wouldn't do that.
-[alarm blaring] -[Carly] You're crazy!
-[device beeping] -We got an Energon reading! We've got aliens in the vehicle!
translation.fr:
- Energon détecté.
- Aliens dans le véhicule.

translation.en: -[screaming] -You move, you're dead! Out! Out!
-Got aliens in the vehicle! -[screaming]
translation.fr: Il y a des aliens dans le véhicule.

translation.en: -Freeze! Get out! -Whoa, whoa, whoa!
translation.fr: Pas un geste ! On geste pas.

translation.en: -We're freezing! -Are you-- Are you kidding me?
translation.fr: Tu... Tu te fous de moi ?

translation.en: [Carly] Sam, they've got guns!
[guard] I got him. Go!
Bee! Is Bee in there?
[groans] Okay, all right!
This how you treat Autobots? We're on the same team.
translation.fr:
On est des Autobots.
On est dans le même camp.

translation.en: Yeah, enjoy your next job at 7-Eleven, dickhead.
translation.fr: T'iras bosser à la supérette, connard.

translation.en: -That's right. -A-hole.
How's your car now?
That's my car.
Come here.
Come here!
Come on. Sam.
What is your deal, huh?
I know your black ops stuff is important to you. I'm not trying to diminish it or guilt-trip you or anything,
translation.fr:
Tes missions, c'est important,
je veux pas te culpabiliser,

translation.en: I just never see you anymore.
You can't come to the garage and just hang out one night?
translation.fr:
Tu pourrais pas passer au garage,
une nuit ?

translation.en: Sam. That makes me feel bad.
I hope you feel bad. You should feel bad. Look at the jalopy I'm driving now. I feel bad every single day.
translation.fr:
J'espère que t'es désolé. Je conduis
une ruine, je suis désolé aussi.

translation.en: [guard] Yo, let's go, both of you. Lennox wants to see you.
What, we not good enough for you anymore? I'm sorry, babe. They were very rude, all right?
translation.fr:
- Tu veux plus de nous ?
- Je suis désolé, chérie.

translation.en: And you're fixing my car. You don't think so?
translation.fr: Réparez ma voiture. Vous voulez pas ?

translation.en: [Sam] Raise your hand if you had a flying psycho-ninja copier trying to kill you today!
translation.fr: Qui a été agressé par un photocopieur ?

translation.en: Those are my brass knuckles.
That's my anklet. Do I have to take that off, too? And my toe rings?
translation.fr:
Et mon bracelet de cheville.
Je l'enlève ?

translation.en: [man, on PA] All NEST officials clear the floor. We have ten minutes until attempted contact.
translation.fr:
Évacuation des officiels.
Tentative de contact dans 10 minutes.

translation.en: [Mearing] We've taken possession of the five devices
translation.fr:
Nous avons les 5 objets
qui étaient dans le vaisseau

translation.en: that were hidden in the ship with Sentinel Prime.
translation.fr:
Nous avons les 5 objets
qui étaient dans le vaisseau avec Sentinel Prime.

translation.en: They're some kind of prototype Autobot technology.
translation.fr:
Il s'agit d'un prototype
d'une technologie autobot.

translation.en: They say Sentinel was the Einstein of his civilization, so we're gonna keep these locked up
translation.fr:
Sentinel était leur Einstein,
alors on met ça de côté

translation.en: until we know what we're dealing with.
translation.fr: jusqu'à ce qu'on en sache plus.

translation.en: Right now, no one gets access. No one.
translation.fr: Pour l'instant, personne n'y touche. Personne.

translation.en: This Wang guy recognized me. He told me to warn you.
translation.fr: Wang m'avait reconnu. Il a parlé de la Lune et il a été tué.

translation.en: He was talking about the dark side of the moon,
translation.fr: Il a parlé de la Lune et il a été tué.

translation.en: -then they killed him. -Wait a minute. He mentioned the moon?
Yeah, dark side of the moon.
But why would Decepticons want to kill humans?
I thought their war was with the Autobots.
translation.fr: Leurs ennemis, ce sont les Autobots.

translation.en: And that is when he made his first quick-look science report. That's what we want--
translation.fr: C'est là qu'il a rédigé cette synthèse.

translation.en: Who's the chick? Okay. Excuse me. Colonel Lennox?
translation.fr: C'est qui, celle-là ? Excusez-moi. Colonel Lennox !

translation.en: Director Mearing, this is Sam Witwicky...
I know his name, Colonel. I wanna know who gave him clearance?
translation.fr: Je sais qui c'est. Qui l'a habilité ?

translation.en: Who gave me clearance? How about Optimus Prime, when he touched down in suburbia looking for my house?
translation.fr:
Optimus Prime,
quand il s'est pointé chez moi.

translation.en: This is the National Intelligence Director. In case you...
-Hi. -Disrespecting a federal officer? Huh. Maybe that'll get you somewhere. Who's she?
translation.fr:
Outrage à un officier fédéral, bravo.
C'est qui ?

translation.en: -She's my girlfriend. -What is this, like, a date?
translation.fr: Ma petite amie. C'est une sortie en amoureux ?

translation.en: She knows all about the Autobots, okay? She knows Bumblebee.
translation.fr:
Elle est au courant,
elle connaît Bee,

translation.en: And she comes from a military family. I can vouch for her.
translation.fr:
sa famille est dans l'armée,
j'en suis garant.

translation.en: Hey, I have an idea. How about we get back to the important topics,
translation.fr: Revenons au sujet qui nous intéresse,

translation.en: like the fact that I almost had my face cut off by a Decepticon?
translation.fr: le Decepticon qui voulait me décapiter.

translation.en: As a taxpayer, I'd like to lodge a complaint, as a matter of fact.
One of the software engineers at Sam's office was murdered today. He was involved in NASA's lunar mapping probe.
translation.fr:
Un informaticien a été assassiné.
Il a travaillé pour la NASA.

translation.en: Here's the thing, Colonel Lennox.
We cannot entrust national security to teenagers
translation.fr:
On n'expose pas la sécurité nationale
à des ados,

translation.en: unless I missed a policy paper.
translation.fr: à moins que j'aie raté une directive.

translation.en: Are we doing that now? No. Good.
translation.fr:
Est-on censé le faire ?
Non ? Bon.

translation.en: I don't care who you are.
translation.fr: Je me fiche de votre nom,

translation.en: If you breathe a word of what you see in here, you will do time for treason.
translation.fr:
si vous parlez de tout ça,
vous serez jugé pour trahison.

translation.en: Do you understand me?
I'll take my orders from the Autobots. I know them. I don't know you.
translation.fr:
J'obéis aux Autobots.
Vous, je vous connais pas.

translation.en: You will.
[Lennox] Sentinel Prime.
These things run on Energon, and he's out of it.
He's in a sort of a sleep mode.
[Optimus] Let us begin.
That's the great Matrix of Leadership.
He holds the only thing in the universe that can repower a Transformer's spark.
translation.fr:
La seule chose au monde
qui puisse réactiver leur spark.

translation.en: This is incredible.
Sentinel Prime...
we bid you return.
Hold your fire!
Stop! Sentinel!
It is I, Optimus Prime!
It is all right. You are safe.
There is nothing to fear.
We are here.
You are home, Sentinel.
translation.fr: Vous êtes revenu parmi nous, Sentinel.

translation.en: The war... The war!
[Optimus] The war was lost.
Cybertron is now but a barren wasteland.
translation.fr:
Cybertron
n'est plus qu'un champ de ruines.

translation.en: We have taken refuge here, on planet Earth.
translation.fr:
Nous avons trouvé refuge
sur la planète Terre,

translation.en: Its human race is our ally.
translation.fr:
les humains qui l'habitent
sont nos alliés.

translation.en: My ship. We came under fire.
translation.fr:
Mon vaisseau...
Nous avons essuyé des tirs...

translation.en: The pillars. Where are the pillars?
translation.fr: Les piliers, où sont les piliers ?

translation.en: You saved five of them, including the control pillar.
translation.fr: Vous en avez sauvé 5, dont le pilier de contrôle.

translation.en: Only five?
We once had hundreds! [Mearing] Excuse me, gentlemen.
translation.fr:
- Nous en avions des centaines.
- Pardon !

translation.en: May I ask, what is this technology you're looking for?
translation.fr:
Quelle est cette technologie
que vous cherchez ?

translation.en: [Sentinel] It is the ability to reshape the universe.
Together, the pillars form a space bridge.
translation.fr: les piliers forment un pont spatial.

translation.en: I designed, and I alone, can control it.
translation.fr:
Je l'ai mise au point
et moi seul peux la contrôler.

translation.en: It defies your laws of physics to transport matter through time and space.
translation.fr:
Elle permet de transporter la matière
dans le temps et dans l'espace.

translation.en: You're talking about a teleportation device, aren't you?
Yes, for resources, for refugees.
translation.fr: Pour des ressources ou des réfugiés.

translation.en: Refugees, or troops of soldiers, weapons, maybe bombs!
translation.fr:
Des réfugiés, des soldats,
des armes voire des bombes !

translation.en: A means of an instant strike! That's its military function, isn't it?
translation.fr:
De quoi lancer une frappe éclair,
n'est-ce pas ?

translation.en: It is our technology, and it must be returned.
translation.fr:
Cette technologie est la nôtre
et nous devons la récupérer.

translation.en: Yes. If humans say so.
You can't just bring weapons of mass destruction into our atmosphere!
translation.fr:
Vous ne pouvez pas importer
vos armes dans notre atmosphère !

translation.en: You kind of have to clear customs first!
A little formality called paperwork, kind of separates us from the animals.
translation.fr:
La paperasse, c'est
ce qui nous distingue des animaux.

translation.en: I will overlook your condescending tone
translation.fr:
Je passerai
sur votre ton condescendant

translation.en: if you heed the gravity of mine.
translation.fr: si vous entendez la gravité du mien.

translation.en: The Decepticons must never know the space bridge is here.
translation.fr:
Les Decepticons ne doivent pas
savoir où est le pont.

translation.en: For in their hands,
it would mean the end of your world.
translation.fr: il provoquerait la fin de votre monde.

translation.en: "Total Nightmare" file.
So, the investigation is open. We've sent agents to your office.
translation.fr:
Nous avons envoyé des agents
à votre bureau.

translation.en: And, for the time being, we're gonna send you home with Autobot protection.
translation.fr: Vous aurez la protection des Autobots.

translation.en: Who do I need to speak to
translation.fr:
Vous comprenez pas
que je peux vous aider ?

translation.en: to get you guys to understand that I can help, that I can contribute?
translation.fr:
Vous comprenez pas
que je peux vous aider ? Que je peux contribuer...

translation.en: Hey, we can all help. Want to tell you what I know? I could tell you about the solar system, all the fun planets to hang out in.
translation.fr:
On peut tous aider.
Je connais les planètes où on s'éclate.

translation.en: Get off my desk, please.
You pulling out guns? I can't help you out now. She angry.
translation.fr: Vous sortez votre arme ? Laisse tomber, elle est vénère.

translation.en: What do you envision for me? I go home now? I go back to work? I make copies? I mean...
translation.fr:
Alors, je rentre chez moi ?
Je retourne faire des copies ?

translation.en: This is a unit for veteran intelligence officers and Special Forces,
translation.fr:
Il y a ici des agents du Renseignement
et des forces spéciales,

translation.en: not for boys who once owned special cars.
translation.fr:
pas des gamins qui ont eu
une voiture spéciale.

translation.en: That's a bit harsh, isn't it, ma'am?
Don't call me ma'am. I'm not a ma'am.
Well, you're a woman, aren't you?
So... are those yours?
Yeah. CIA.
I only ask 'cause I also have a medal, from the President.
translation.fr:
À moi aussi,
on m'a donné une médaille. Le Président.

translation.en: Yeah. Great. So, it's not that complicated, right?
No one gets to work with the Autobots unless I approve it.
translation.fr:
On n'approche les Autobots
qu'avec mon aval.

translation.en: You're breaking my chain of command.
Come on, let's go. You've done what you came for.
translation.fr:
Viens. Tu as fait
ce que tu avais à faire.

translation.en: With all due respect, young man, I appreciate what you did.
translation.fr:
Jeune homme,
je respecte ce que vous avez fait

translation.en: But you're not a soldier. You're a messenger. You've always been a messenger.
translation.fr:
mais vous n'êtes qu'un messager.
Depuis le début.

translation.en: He's a hero.
Bee, you take the freight elevator. I'll see you up there.
translation.fr: Prends le monte-charge, on se rejoint.

translation.en: This blows. That lady officially kicked us out.
translation.fr:
Ça craint.
Elle nous a officiellement foutus dehors.

translation.en: Yeah. Witness Protection Program sucks.
translation.fr:
La protection des témoins,
c'est pourri.

translation.en: Yeah, but we're a whole lot safer with big yellow and his cannons.
translation.fr:
N'empêche, on est à l'abri
avec le Bourdon armé.

translation.en: That dog can't protect crap.
translation.fr: Le chien assure rien en protection.

translation.en: [Sam] Bee?
You miss hanging out?
Yeah, me too.
That woman, she called me a messenger. Can you believe that? After everything I've done, I'm a messenger.
translation.fr:
Elle m'a traité de "messager",
après tout ce que j'ai fait !

translation.en: I believe it. I tell you, Sammy, we feel the same way. The disrespect on this rock is criminal.
translation.fr:
Ça nous fait pareil. Le manque de
respect sur cette planète, c'est dingue.

translation.en: We should do something about it.
Bee, I need to know why they're killing humans.
translation.fr: Bee... Pourquoi ils tuent des humains ?

translation.en: I say we call in the expert.
[O'Reilly] My next guest is a former American intelligence operative who has dared to speak out
translation.fr:
Voici maintenant un ancien agent
du Renseignement qui ose se prononcer

translation.en: regarding our alleged military alliance with what many describe
translation.fr:
sur notre alliance militaire
avec ce que d'aucuns appellent

translation.en: as a group of extraterrestrial mercenaries.
He is the author of the bestselling book, Code-Name Hero.
translation.fr: Il est l'auteur du bestseller "Nom de code : héros"...

translation.en: Former special agent, Seymour Simmons.
Bill. Big fan. Great to be here.
translation.fr:
Bill !
Je suis un fan, ça me fait plaisir.

translation.en: Now, Agent Simmons, you would have us believe that it is in our best interest
translation.fr:
Vous voulez nous faire croire
que nous devrions

translation.en: to formally take sides in this so-called alien civil war?
translation.fr:
prendre parti dans cette
"guerre civile extraterrestre" ?

translation.en: Well, the other side wanted to spank us for breakfast,
translation.fr: Le camp d'en face nous massacrerait,

translation.en: so I wouldn't exactly call it a toss-up.
translation.fr: alors, on n'a pas vraiment le choix.

translation.en: These Decepticons are lethal.
But polls show half the world would feel safer with the Autobots completely gone.
translation.fr:
Les gens se sentiraient plus en sécurité
si les Autobots partaient.

translation.en: Get them out of here! We don't need them here!
translation.fr: Dehors ! On n'a pas besoin d'eux !

translation.en: I feel safer when I sleep with a hand grenade. Doesn't mean I'm always right.
translation.fr:
Je dors avec une grenade,
mais j'ai pas toujours raison.
