translation.en: And here, they call us machines.
translation.fr: Ici, on nous traite de machines.

translation.en: Let the humans serve us, or perish.
translation.fr: Que les humains nous servent ou qu'ils périssent !

translation.en: You're lucky I didn't kill you. In time you'll see.
translation.fr:
Tu as de la chance
que je t'aie épargné. Un jour, tu comprendras.

translation.en: It's not over.
[Dylan] Now, if I were him, I wouldn't let you out of my sight for one second.
translation.fr: Si j'étais lui... je ne vous perdrais pas de vue.

translation.en: It's funny. I was just thinking on the way over here, I could really use some advice from Dylan, and there he is.
translation.fr:
C'est marrant, je me disais
que j'aurais besoin de l'avis de Dylan.

translation.en: -Can I speak to you, Carly? -Welcome. Please, sit down. Have a drink.
You know what, I don't need a drink. Or a car, or a job.
translation.fr:
Je veux pas de verre,
ni de voiture ni de boulot.

translation.en: I just need to speak to my girlfriend alone. Is that okay with you, Mr. Inappropriate?
translation.fr:
Je peux parler à ma copine,
M. Déplacé ?

translation.en: Excuse me.
-[Carly] What's going on? -[Sam] I'll tell you outside.
translation.fr:
- Qu'est-ce qu'il y a ?
- On sort.

translation.en: I really think I can help you, Sam. I remember a talk I had with my dad once about tough choices.
translation.fr:
J'ai eu une discussion avec mon père,
sur les choix difficiles.

translation.en: Yeah, now's not the time. We'll set something up, though.
translation.fr: Pas le temps. Une autre fois.

translation.en: Of course, it was way back, when my dad's firm was in charge of budget review and accounting for NASA.
translation.fr:
C'était quand la société de mon père
gérait les comptes de la NASA.

translation.en: You see, the thing that he taught me was,
translation.fr:
Il m'a dit :
"Si ce n'est pas ta guerre,

translation.en: when it's not your war, you join the side that's going to win.
translation.fr:
Il m'a dit :
"Si ce n'est pas ta guerre, choisis le camp des plus forts."

translation.en: -Move. -Too direct? Or is it just me? Certainly not you, sir.
translation.fr:
- Trop cash ou c'est moi ?
- Impossible.

translation.en: -[Carly screams] -[Soundwave] You're mine!
-Get help! -Sam, I can't get out!
-[Sam] Someone get help! -Good night!
Good night, Mr. Dylan.
[Carly] Get me out of here!
[Sam] Help! Get help!
-He's young. He will learn. Good night. -Get me out!
translation.fr:
Il est jeune, il apprendra. - Sors-moi de là !
- Bonsoir.

translation.en: It was a fun night.
You really think you're the first man ever asked to join the noble alien cause?
translation.fr:
Tu croyais être le premier
à rejoindre la noble cause des aliens ?

translation.en: Who are you?
Do you know why we've not been back to the moon since 1972?
translation.fr:
Sais-tu pourquoi on n'est plus allés
sur la Lune depuis 1972 ?

translation.en: Because these two,
they came to my dad and they told him to do some creative accounting.
translation.fr:
ont demandé à mon père
de trafiquer les comptes

translation.en: Make it way too expensive to ever go back. So, he and the others
translation.fr: pour que le budget soit trop élevé.

translation.en: shut down the American and Russian space programs.
translation.fr:
Ils ont sabordé
les programmes spatiaux.

translation.en: And they've been our clients ever since.
You helped them kill people? You think they'd give you a choice?
translation.fr:
- Vous les aidez à tuer ?
- J'ai le choix ?

translation.en: Besides, it's not like I personally participated.
translation.fr:
Je ne fais rien.
Je ne suis qu'un lien.

translation.en: I am a liaison. I liaise.
translation.fr:
Je ne fais rien.
Je ne suis qu'un lien. Je fais le lien.

translation.en: It's hostile takeover time, Sam.
Sam!
-Let her go! -Sam!
Sam!
[Dylan] I've had my eye on you for years, Sam.
You're the one spy I've never been able to provide as someone close to the Autobots.
translation.fr:
Je n'arrivais pas à fournir
un espion proche des Autobots.

translation.en: Sam! Don't do what he wants!
translation.fr: Ne fais pas ce qu'il veut !

translation.en: Yes, he will. They all do.
translation.fr: Mais si. Ils le font tous.

translation.en: They will slaughter her, you understand me?
translation.fr: Ils vont la massacrer, tu sais.

translation.en: In the time it takes you to blink, they'll do it to her, and they'll do it to me.
translation.fr:
En un clin d'œil,
ils peuvent la massacrer et moi avec.

translation.en: So you show a little respect when someone offers you a job!
translation.fr:
Alors, un peu de respect
quand on te propose un boulot !

translation.en: Wrist.
You are to track down Optimus Prime, because you're the one human he trusts,
translation.fr:
Va trouver Optimus Prime,
il n'a confiance qu'en toi.

translation.en: and you will ask one question.
How does he intend to fight back? Strategies, tactics, everything!
translation.fr:
Comment compte-t-il répliquer ?
Stratégie, tactique, tout !

translation.en: Has a nasty little bite, doesn't it? It's very high-tech.
It lets us see what you see, hear what you hear,
translation.fr:
On voit ce que tu vois,
on entend ce que tu entends

translation.en: and it taps your nervous system. So, if you so much as try and signal...
translation.fr:
et il agit sur ton système nerveux.
Au moindre geste...

translation.en: I don't know what to tell you, Sam. Relationships have consequences. I am here because of my father.
translation.fr:
Nos relations ont des conséquences.
J'en suis là à cause de mon père.

translation.en: She is here because of you.
translation.fr: Elle en est là à cause de toi.

translation.en: Stop, stop! Stop! Stop!
Soundwave, would you please?
Sam, do your job.
translation.fr: Sam, fais ce que tu as à faire.

translation.en: She'll be safe. I give you my word.
translation.fr: Il ne lui arrivera rien. Je te le promets.

translation.en: I'll kill you. You have my word.
translation.fr: Je vous tuerai. Je vous le promets.

translation.en: [Morshower] Combatant Commands are now at DEFCON 1.
translation.fr:
Le commandement opérationnel
est en DEFCON 1.

translation.en: Approximately 200 Decepticons are now in hiding.
Energon detectors have been triggered as far away as South America and China.
translation.fr:
On détecte de l'Energon
en Amérique du Sud et en Chine.

translation.en: The U.N. just received an encrypted audio file.
translation.fr: L'ONU a reçu un fichier audio crypté,

translation.en: They say it's from the leader of the Autobots.
translation.fr: c'est un message du chef des Autobots.

translation.en: [Sentinel] Defenders of Earth,
we have come for your natural resources
to rebuild our damaged planet.
When we have transported all we need,
we will leave your world in peace.
For such peace to exist,
translation.fr: Pour que cette paix soit possible,

translation.en: you must immediately exile the Autobot rebels you have harbored.
translation.fr:
nous exigeons que vous expulsiez
les Autobots que vous abritez.

translation.en: Non-negotiable.
Renounce the rebels.
We await your reply.
[Mearing] We'll debrief you in transit.
Yeah, I really don't see how I can be of any help. I mean, you guys seem pretty busy.
translation.fr:
Je peux pas faire grand-chose,
vous êtes occupés,

translation.en: We could just do this another time, I think.
translation.fr: on remet ça à plus tard ?

translation.en: I have underestimated you at every turn.
You warned us that they were using humans. And you knew that Sentinel was the key.
translation.fr:
Vous saviez pour les humains
à leur solde et pour Sentinel.

translation.en: [man] Director!
Who am I? Hey, you're the expert. I'm just a walking security risk.
translation.fr:
Vous êtes l'experte.
Vous prendriez un risque avec moi.

translation.en: Are you all right?
-Yes. -No, you're not. You're sweating. I'm fine. I'm fine.
translation.fr:
- Mais non, vous transpirez.
- Ça va.

translation.en: I'm sweating because I'm nervous.
I'm nervous because you got me in here with this information. Okay, I'm a Twitter junkie. I blog everything.
translation.fr:
Vous m'amenez là avec cette info
alors que je suis accro à Twitter...

translation.en: -I can't keep a secret to save my life. -You wouldn't dare.
translation.fr:
- je dévoile tout.
- Vous n'oseriez pas.

translation.en: Director, the Pentagon's calling in 15.
-What are you doing? -Nothing. What are you doing?
translation.fr:
- Vous faites quoi ?
- Et vous, vous faites quoi ?

translation.en: Get away from me.
It's been a remarkable series of events today at the Capitol.
translation.fr:
Les événements
se sont succédé au Capitole

translation.en: Just moments ago, legislation was passed
translation.fr:
et des dispositions ont été prises
pour expulser les Autobots

translation.en: to exile the Autobots from American shores.
translation.fr:
et des dispositions ont été prises
pour expulser les Autobots du sol américain.

translation.en: The U.S. military alliance with them -is officially over. -[phone vibrating]
translation.fr:
Notre alliance militaire
est officiellement caduque.

translation.en: In the words of the House Majority Leader, the sponsor of today's resolution,
translation.fr:
Le chef de la majorité,
qui a fait adopter la résolution...

translation.en: What? They can't do this.
translation.fr: Quoi ? Ils peuvent pas faire ça !

translation.en: You gotta tell them. They can't do that.
Okay. It's official. It's a go, people.
These are our allies. The Autobots fought for us. They fought with us.
translation.fr:
C'est nos alliés,
ils se sont battus pour nous.

translation.en: And where are we now? Facing an enemy invasion
translation.fr:
Et ça nous a apporté quoi ?
Une invasion

translation.en: with an enemy that has the means to deploy countless more.
translation.fr:
par un ennemi
qui peut se multiplier à l'infini.

translation.en: If there is any more you know,
anything at all about the enemy's intentions...
now is the time to tell.
Autobots have no way of leaving this planet.
translation.fr:
Les Autobots
n'ont aucun moyen de partir.

translation.en: And that is where you're wrong.
Its name is the Xanthium.
It brought the second wave of Autobots, and it's been under NASA's care and study ever since.
translation.fr:
Il a amené la seconde vague d'Autobots
et la NASA l'a conservé depuis.

translation.en: We linked it with a decommissioned shuttle to maintain military control until they're gone.
translation.fr:
Nous l'avons couplé à une navette
retirée du service pour le contrôler.

translation.en: Gonna be 10,000 pounds of torque on that itsy-bitsy bolt, not 19!
translation.fr:
Il y aura 10 000 livres de contrainte
sur ce boulon ! Pas 19 !

translation.en: You're gonna risk the lives of all me mates! I'll ball you!
translation.fr:
Vous mettez
la vie de mes potes en danger !

translation.en: These guys are the Wreckers. They take care of the Xanthium.
translation.fr:
Les Wreckers,
ils entretiennent le Xanthium.

translation.en: We don't let them off the base much, 'cause they're assholes.
translation.fr: On les sort peu, c'est des connards.

translation.en: You gotta pull that, ya nancy wanker!
It's time to kill him!
I'm just trying to help, you know. Just doing my job.
translation.fr: Je fais que mon boulot, moi !

translation.en: [Epps] Just calm down. Leave him alone. This is a human being.
-Epps! -[Roadbuster] You are ridiculous!
-[Sam] Is that you? -What up, man?
-What are you doing here? -[electronic whirring]
I retired from the Air Force.
Can you let my hand go?
What the hell was that?
Now I just consult to run interference for them.
[Roadbuster] Well, you're not helping!
No more combat and aliens shooting at my ass. I got a dream job.
translation.fr:
Plus d'alien au cul,
j'ai un boulot de rêve...

translation.en: [Roadbuster] Time to get off this planet.
Kicking the Autobots out. Can you believe this is happening?
translation.fr: On fout les Autobots à la porte. T'y crois, toi ?

translation.en: Where do you think it's taking them?
Any planet but here.
I wanna talk to whoever's in charge here.
translation.fr: Je veux parler à votre responsable.

translation.en: Well, well, well. Charlotte Mearing.
Agent Simmons. Former Agent Simmons. So, I see you survived Washington.
translation.fr:
Ex-agent Simmons.
Vous avez survécu à Washington.

translation.en: Washington, Egypt, heartbreak. I survive. I will survive.
translation.fr:
À Washington, à l'Égypte,
aux ruptures... Je survivrai.

translation.en: They're bringing everybody in, kid. Putting all the intel on the table.
translation.fr:
Ils rappellent tout le monde
et on met tout sur la table.

translation.en: And if you think deporting nine Autobots is gonna solve a damn thing--
translation.fr:
Si vous croyez que déporter neuf
Autobots va résoudre quoi que ce soit...

translation.en: It's out of my hands.
translation.fr: Ce n'est plus de mon ressort.

translation.en: Moving up in the world, huh?
Your booty looks excellent.
If you ever say a word to anyone about what happened that night in Quantico, I'll cut your heart out.
translation.fr:
Si tu dis un mot de ce qui s'est passé
à Quantico, je t'arrache le cœur.

translation.en: You already did.
[Wheelie] Sammy, listen to me. Don't let them exile us.
translation.fr:
Sam, écoute. - Les laisse pas nous exiler.
- Empêche-les.

translation.en: Don't let them take us, Sam.
translation.fr:
- Les laisse pas nous exiler.
- Empêche-les.

translation.en: It's a Decepticon trap.
[Leadfoot] Check the nitrogen levels. We're booking out of here.
translation.fr:
Vérifie les niveaux de nitrogène.
On dégage.

translation.en: What your leaders say is true. This was all my fault.
translation.fr: Vos dirigeants ont raison. C'est ma faute.

translation.en: I told them whom to trust. I was so wrong.
translation.fr: Je leur ai dit à qui faire confiance. Je me suis bien trompé.

translation.en: That doesn't make it your fault. It just makes you human for a change.
translation.fr:
C'est pas ta faute.
Ça te rend un peu humain.

translation.en: Remember this.
You may lose your faith in us,
translation.fr:
Vous pouvez
perdre toute confiance en nous,

translation.en: but never in yourselves.
I need to know how you're gonna fight back.
translation.fr: Je veux savoir ce que vous allez faire.

translation.en: I know this is strategy, I know you're coming back
translation.fr:
Vous avez une stratégie,
des renforts, quelque chose.

translation.en: with reinforcements, something. I know there's a plan.
translation.fr:
Vous avez une stratégie,
des renforts, quelque chose. Vous avez forcément un plan...

translation.en: You can tell me. No other human will ever know.
translation.fr:
Dis-le-moi,
aucun autre humain le saura.

translation.en: There is no plan.
If we just do what they want, how are we gonna live with ourselves?
translation.fr:
Si on leur obéit,
on pourra plus se regarder en face.

translation.en: You are my friend, Sam.
You always will be.
But your leaders have spoken.
From here...
the fight will be your own.
[Optimus] Make it short.
We're loading up.
[Leadfoot] All right, hustle up! We're launching at dawn.
translation.fr: Allez, on se magne ! Lancement à l'aube !

translation.en: We're gonna do whatever we can. Make it like it was.
translation.fr: On fera ce qu'on pourra... Pour que tout s'arrange...

translation.en: You will always be my friend, Sam.
I gotta be going on.
Years from now, they're gonna ask us,
translation.fr:
Dans des années,
on nous demandera

translation.en: "Where were you when they took over the planet?"
translation.fr:
où on était
quand ils ont envahi la planète.

translation.en: We're gonna say,
"We just stood by and watched."
[Dylan] You should really look at this as a partnership.
You have to stand on the side of progress if you wanna be a part of history.
translation.fr:
Il faut être du bon côté
pour entrer dans l'Histoire.

translation.en: [launch announcer] Seven, six, five,
four, three, two, one, zero.
Go ahead and throttle up.
translation.fr:
Allez-y et mettez pleins gaz,
CAPCOM. Vol de lancement.

translation.en: First flight.
translation.fr:
Allez-y et mettez pleins gaz,
CAPCOM. Vol de lancement. Allez-y.

translation.en: You wanted an answer. You got one.
I always get what I want, Sam. We just needed to be sure.
translation.fr:
J'obtiens toujours ce que je veux.
Nous voulions être sûrs.

translation.en: -Sure of what? -That they would go without a fight.
translation.fr: Sûrs de quoi ? Qu'ils ne se battraient pas.

translation.en: -[man] Say again. -[woman] We're tracking an incoming object.
We all work for the Decepticons now.
translation.fr: On travaille tous pour les Decepticons.

translation.en: I need your help to track a phone call. There's a man on this phone. He's the head of their human operations, and he has Carly hostage.
translation.fr:
Localise cet appel. Ce mec
fait leur sale boulot et il détient Carly.

translation.en: I want you to sit down. Don't move.
Follow me.
I'm watching him drive up right now.
[Dutch] The call was placed en route. I'm hacking into the phone's camera now.
translation.fr:
L'appel a été passé en route.
J'ai accès à la caméra du téléphone.

translation.en: There, that's it. That's a live stream from the camera.
translation.fr:
Voilà, ça y est !
C'est du direct.

translation.en: Someplace... Hold on. I can triangulate this.
Okay, it's Chicago cell sites. There, I've got it.
translation.fr: C'est l'antenne de Chicago. Je l'ai.

translation.en: Trump Tower, Chicago. Lower penthouse.
translation.fr: Tour Trump à Chicago, au penthouse.

translation.en: We're on.
-I'm going. -[Simmons] You sure?
She's done nothing but try to help me, and I can be there in 15 hours.
translation.fr:
Elle voulait m'aider.
J'y serai dans 15 heures.

translation.en: [Epps] You're not going alone.
I still got my NEST friends out there.
translation.fr: J'ai toujours des potes au NEST.

translation.en: I'll round them up, we'll find your girlfriend, we're gonna bring this guy in.
translation.fr:
On retrouve ta copine
et on serre le gars.

translation.en: Why are you helping me?
'Cause that asshole killed my friends, too.
translation.fr:
Parce que ce connard
a buté mes copains.

translation.en: They said they were here for our resources, to rebuild their planet.
translation.fr:
Ils ont dit qu'ils voulaient prélever
nos ressources pour rebâtir leur planète.

translation.en: Yes, but really one resource in particular.
translation.fr:
En fait, ils veulent
une seule ressource.

translation.en: One unique to our planet.
Us?
You're very smart.
You see, they can't rebuild without a slave labor force.
How many rocks up there in the universe offer six billion workers?
translation.fr:
Où est-ce qu'ils trouveraient
6 milliards d'ouvriers ?

translation.en: What are you talking about? We can't transport people.
translation.fr: Ils ne peuvent pas transporter les gens.

translation.en: They're not shipping people. They're shipping their planet here.
translation.fr: C'est leur planète qu'ils feront venir.

translation.en: [Carly] Oh, my God.
What's Sentinel doing here?
[Dylan] Watch. They're spreading hundreds of pillars around the globe right now.
translation.fr:
Regardez, ils installent des piliers
dans le monde entier,

translation.en: In just a few hours, they're gonna launch them into orbit
translation.fr: ils vont les mettre en orbite

translation.en: and bring Cybertron into our atmosphere.
translation.fr:
et faire entrer Cybertron
dans notre atmosphère.

translation.en: The red one there controls the rest.
He triggers that, it starts the whole thing.
translation.fr: Il l'active et ça déclenche le reste.

translation.en: Be gone, insect operative. Your work is done.
translation.fr:
Disparais, insecte.
Ton travail est terminé.

translation.en: Your Excellency. He's such a dick.
You want this to happen?
I want to survive. I want 40 more years.
translation.fr:
Je veux vivre encore 40 ans.
J'ai rien demandé.

translation.en: You think I asked for this? I inherited a client.
translation.fr:
Je veux vivre encore 40 ans.
J'ai rien demandé. J'ai hérité de ce client.

translation.en: Yeah, and when Cybertron's here and we're all their slaves, I guess they'll still need a human leader.
translation.fr:
Quand nous serons leurs esclaves,
il leur faudra un leader humain.

translation.en: Don't jinx me. You want to survive, you listen to me.
translation.fr:
Ne dites rien.
Pour survivre, écoutez-moi.

translation.en: It is time for the slaves of Earth to recognize their masters.
translation.fr:
L'heure est venue pour les esclaves
terriens de reconnaître leurs maîtres.

translation.en: Seal off the city.
Get the dogs out of here now! Get them in the back!
I guess they didn't tell you about this part, did they?
translation.fr: Ils ne vous avaient pas dit ça ?

translation.en: -You think I'm at every meeting? -[breathing heavily]
translation.fr: Je vais pas à toutes les réunions.

translation.en: Look, I'm safe.
They said I was safe.
Let's roll!
[Epps] We had a signal earlier.
It's not working.
[newscaster, on radio] This is a national emergency broadcast.
translation.fr: Nous sommes en état d'alerte nationale.

translation.en: Chicago has suffered a massive attack.
[man] Wrong way!
Get out of here! Go back!
There is a ring of alien ships around Chicago.
translation.fr:
La ville est encerclée
de vaisseaux aliens...

translation.en: Our high-range bombers were just knocked out of the sky.
translation.fr:
Nos bombardiers longue portée
ont été descendus.

translation.en: They can't get through enemy air defenses over the city.
translation.fr:
Ils ne peuvent pas passer
la défense antiaérienne.

translation.en: Our satellites have been jammed. We have no way to monitor the enemy's movement.
translation.fr:
Nos satellites sont brouillés, nous
ne pouvons pas surveiller l'ennemi.

translation.en: Our old NEST teams are on stand-down holding at Grissom Air Force Base.
translation.fr:
Le NEST est en attente
sur la base de Grissom

translation.en: We're about ten minutes from the battle zone.
We have Special Forces trying to gain access to the city,
and infantry is staging at the perimeter.
translation.fr: et l'infanterie est dans le périmètre.

translation.en: Excuse me, excuse me, it just doesn't make sense!
Can't we get any eyes in there at all?
translation.fr:
On peut pas voir
ce qui se passe là-bas ?

translation.en: They keep shooting down our drones.
They want us blind.
But we do have a couple of mini-drones we're gonna try.
translation.fr: On va tenter d'envoyer des minidrones.

translation.en: Well, whoever's manning these UAV drones, can we try to redirect them toward Trump Tower?
translation.fr:
Vous pouvez diriger ces drones
vers la tour Trump ?

translation.en: The kid, Witwickety, was on his way to Chicago.
translation.fr: Le gosse, Witwickety, il va à Chicago.

translation.en: Said some point-man human op is there for the Decepticons!
translation.fr:
Il dit qu'il y a un humain là-bas
qui roule pour les Decepticons.

translation.en: Listen, if I know anything, I know this,
that kid is an alien-bad-news magnet.
translation.fr:
ce gosse attire
les embrouilles extraterrestres.

translation.en: My God.
We came here to find her in the middle of all that?
translation.fr: On est censés la retrouver là-dedans ?

translation.en: Are we really going out there, Epps?
I'm not going in there.
No one's going in.
I am.
With or without you, I'll find her.
translation.fr:
Avec ou sans vous,
je la retrouverai.

translation.en: You're gonna get yourself killed, Sam. Is that what you want?
translation.fr: Tu vas te faire tuer, Sam ! C'est ça que tu veux ?

translation.en: Is that what you want?
You came all the way out here to get yourself killed? Huh?
translation.fr: T'es venu jusqu'ici pour te faire tuer ?

translation.en: Listen to what I'm saying.
She's here because of me. Do you understand?
translation.fr: Elle est là à cause de moi.

translation.en: Listen, if you go in this building, that's if she's even still alive,
translation.fr:
Si tu entres dans cet immeuble
et même si elle est en vie,

translation.en: there's no way you're gonna be able to reach her!
What do you suggest I do?
It's over.
I'm sorry, but it's over.
No.
Whoa! Incoming!
We will kill them all.
[Leadfoot] Wreckers, kill him!
[Roadbuster] This is going to hurt!
A lot!
Your leaders will now understand.
Decepticons will never leave your planet alone.
translation.fr:
Les Decepticons
ne laisseront jamais votre planète.

translation.en: And we needed them to believe we had gone.
translation.fr:
Il fallait qu'ils croient
que nous étions partis.

translation.en: For today, in the name of freedom,
translation.fr: Car aujourd'hui, au nom de la liberté,

translation.en: we take the battle to them!
I saw your ship blow up!
We were never in the ship! We designed the damn thing, didn't we?
translation.fr:
On était pas dans le vaisseau. On l'a construit nous-mêmes,
ce truc-là !

translation.en: We were hidden in the first booster rocket to separate.
translation.fr: On était dans la fusée de lancement

translation.en: Splashed down back in the Atlantic, just as planned.
translation.fr:
et on est retombés dans l'Atlantique
comme prévu.

translation.en: We ain't going nowhere.
Yeah, no one's exiling us.
The Autobots are staying right here. We're gonna help you win this war.
translation.fr:
Les Autobots restent.
On va vous aider à gagner cette guerre.

translation.en: They're surrounding the city to make a fortress,
translation.fr:
Ils encerclent la ville,
ils en font une forteresse

translation.en: so that no one can see what they're up to inside.
translation.fr:
pour que personne ne sache
ce qu'ils préparent.

translation.en: Our only chance is the element of surprise.
translation.fr:
Nous ne pouvons compter
que sur l'effet de surprise.

translation.en: I think I know where to look!
translation.fr: Je sais où on doit chercher.

translation.en: [man] Mini-drone is on approach to Trump Tower.
translation.fr:
Minidrone en approche
sur la tour Trump.

translation.en: You're telling me Sam's headed into that?
Poor kid.
Probably never got close.
translation.fr: Il a pas dû pouvoir y arriver.

translation.en: So, you can fly this thing, right?
What is that... What is that? What is that? So-so?
translation.fr: Ça veut dire quoi ? Pas trop ?

translation.en: So you so-so can fly this. That feels terrible.
translation.fr:
Tu sais pas trop le piloter ?
On est mal.

translation.en: We're right behind you.
All right, we're going in!
The city is secure.
The humans cannot stop us.
translation.fr:
Les humains ne peuvent pas
nous arrêter.

translation.en: [Sentinel] As the afternoon falls,
the rest of the pillars will reach their launch position.
translation.fr:
les autres piliers
seront en position de lancement.

translation.en: [Megatron] This is the victory I promised you so many years ago,
translation.fr:
Voici la victoire que je vous ai promise
il y a tant d'années

translation.en: where we rebuild Cybertron together!
translation.fr:
et nous allons reconstruire Cybertron
ensemble !

translation.en: I have deigned to work with you...
translation.fr: J'ai accepté de travailler avec vous

translation.en: that our planet may survive!
I will never work for you!
translation.fr: Je ne travaillerai jamais pour vous.

translation.en: You would be wise to remember the difference.
translation.fr:
Vous feriez bien
de ne pas oublier cette nuance.

translation.en: [Dylan] Ugh! I'm so sick of this. I'm just sick of waiting.
Where is she?
Where is she?
You've got some balls.
No, Sam!
Carly!
Jump!
Bee, fire!
Bee!
Autobots! They're alive! They're here!
translation.fr: Les Autobots, ils sont en vie !

translation.en: Decepticons, defend the pillar!
[Megatron] Raise the bridges! Find them!
Sam.
You found me. I'd follow you anywhere.
translation.fr:
- Tu m'as trouvée.
- Je te suivrais où que tu sois.

translation.en: [soldier] Form a perimeter! Let's go, let's go!
Well, you're crazy.
What is that? Is that us?
[Epps] This thing's a military UAV.
Stone, check and see if it's still working.
[Stone] Yeah, it's still got power.
Flight Control, do you copy?
translation.fr:
Station de commande,
vous me recevez ?

translation.en: Can... Can you rotate? Can you do something?
I think we got something.
-[Lennox] Epps! We got Epps! -...rotate, something.
[Epps] Come on, work! Work!
All right, turn the volume up on that!
The kid!
Can you rotate or something?
Yes, yes! Okay, okay, okay. They can see us.
Chicago is ground zero, do you understand?
-Can you hear us? You understand? -Witwicky.
Please listen. Sentinel Prime is here, and he has the pillars to his space bridge.
translation.fr: Sentinel a les piliers du pont spatial.

translation.en: They're on top of a building on Chicago River. It's owned by Hotchkiss Gould Investments.
translation.fr:
Ils sont sur le toit
de la tour Hotchkiss Gould.

translation.en: Now, the pillar that controls everything is in the southeast cupola.
translation.fr:
Le pilier de contrôle
est dans la coupole sud-est.

translation.en: You've got to destroy the pillar. You have to shoot down the pillar, or they're going to transport Cybertron here, do you understand?
translation.fr:
Il faut le détruire,
ou ils vont apporter Cybertron ici.

translation.en: -Do you understand? -What?
Give me a GPS on the building and on that drone! Let's go!
Mensurate those coordinates. Shorten the kill chain.
[Lennox] Guys on the tarmac, five minutes.
The southeast cupola.
All right!
We need to move before the fighters spot us.
Wait here until we scout a route ahead.
translation.fr:
Laissez-nous le temps d'ouvrir la voie.
Transformation.

translation.en: -Let's roll. -Ratchet, cover high.
Hey, think we could use that rocket to shoot down the pillar?
translation.fr: Ce missile peut éclater le pilier ?

translation.en: We're eight blocks away. We got to get closer to take a shot.
translation.fr:
On est à huit rues,
il faudrait être plus près.

translation.en: Not closer. Higher. We need a clear line of sight.
translation.fr:
Pas plus près, plus haut.
Il faut une vue dégagée.

translation.en: And it's across the river. Gonna have a hell of a time trying to sneak up.
translation.fr:
C'est sur l'autre rive,
on passera pas inaperçus.

translation.en: We only got one shot.
One shot's all we need.
translation.fr: On a pas besoin de plus.

translation.en: [Simmons] We got to be able to see around that building from the ground.
translation.fr: Il faut voir la tour depuis le sol.

translation.en: Get NSA to send service specs for any cameras in that area. Maybe some are working.
translation.fr:
Les caméras de surveillance,
il en reste peut-être.

translation.en: Traffic lights. ATMs. Anything.
translation.fr:
Sur les feux, les distributeurs,
je sais pas.

translation.en: [Lennox] Listen up. You want to hit back?
We're gonna have to wingsuit in.
It's the only way to get close.
translation.fr: C'est le seul moyen de les approcher.

translation.en: I can't promise anyone a ride home, but if you're with me,
translation.fr:
Je promets pas de vous ramener,
mais si vous venez...

translation.en: the world needs you now.
translation.fr: le monde a besoin de vous.

translation.en: I'll find my own ride home, sir.
Who else?
General Morshower,
requesting diversionary action to the south of the city.
translation.fr:
Général, manœuvre
de diversion requise au sud de la ville.

translation.en: We're coming north and low. You guys drive them to the east.
translation.fr:
On va au nord.
Occupez-les à l'est.

translation.en: Autobot victory! Autobot victory!
[Epps] That is one scary-ass Decepticon!
translation.fr: Ça, c'est un Decepticon de la mort !

translation.en: They got my trailer. I need that flight tech.
translation.fr:
Ils ont ma remorque.
J'en ai besoin pour voler.

translation.en: Shockwave can't hunt all of us at once. Wreckers,
translation.fr:
Shockwave ne peut pas
nous pourchasser tous. Wreckers...

translation.en: we need a diversion.
Let's get some!
You got that right.
Listen, we're gonna circle around to that glass building.
And we'll get high enough to make the rocket shot
while you guys draw his fire.
-Let's move! -Wait a minute!
translation.fr:
On y va ! Attendez ! N'y allez pas
sans mes prototypes de combat urbain.

translation.en: I'm not letting you go out there without my urban combat prototypes.
translation.fr:
Attendez ! N'y allez pas
sans mes prototypes de combat urbain.

translation.en: We got to go, Que! Come on.
They're great inventions for kicking ass!
translation.fr:
- Vous allez tout péter.
- C'est quoi ?

translation.en: Those are boom-sticks. Armed in 30 seconds.
translation.fr: Des bâtons-bombes. Mise à feu : 30 secondes.

translation.en: Grapple gloves, for climbing.
[soldier] Go, go! Move your ass! Move, move!
[Optimus] Move, move! Go, go, go!
-Move, move! -[Epps] Let's go!
Let's go! Run!
-Hey, hey, hey. Where you going? -No, no, no!
-Where you going? -Stop, stop, stop! Don't leave!
You never leave a bot behind! Shockwave's coming!
translation.fr: On abandonne pas un Bot... Shockwave se pointe.

translation.en: [Epps] Go for the stairs!
[Sam] Epps, this way!
[pilot 1, on radio] Breaking right.
[pilot 2] Bead. Rolling in.
We got another one coming around. Coming around on the left side, coming around on the right side.
translation.fr:
Un approche par le flanc gauche
et un par le droit.

translation.en: We're going to use Willis Tower for cover!
translation.fr: La tour Willis va nous masquer.

translation.en: Once we make altitude, we jump!
translation.fr: Une fois en altitude, on saute.

translation.en: -A lot of airplanes out here! -Contact off the nose.
translation.fr: De nombreux appareils autour de nous.

translation.en: [pilot 1] Mayday! I don't think he's gonna make it. [pilot 2] Mayday, mayday! Six-one going down.
translation.fr:
Mayday, je ne crois pas
qu'il va s'en tirer.

translation.en: Heads up! Heads up!
Come on, come on, come on, come on.
[pilot 1] Tally on the left. [pilot 2] Got him.
translation.fr:
- Cible à gauche.
- Je la vois.

translation.en: Time on target: 20 seconds.
[Lennox] Here we go! Here we go!
Keep it tight!
[Baby Face] All right, focus, focus, focus.
[pilot] Threat above tower, six o'clock!
[Starscream] Locusts!
[pilot] Look out! Breaking right, breaking right!
[pilot 1] Watch out, watch out! [pilot 2] Holy shit!
Look out, look out, look out!
Get them out, get them out, get them out! [Lennox] Everybody out, out, out!
[soldier] Jump, jump, jump!
Get out, get out!
I'm stuck!
[pilot] Now. Get them out now! Get them out now!
Help!
[soldier] Get separation. Track away, track away!
[Lennox] Hard left! Hard left!
Six hundred feet.
Check your six! Check your six!
-[Lennox] He's on our ass! -Watch out, watch out!
[Lennox] Sharp right!
Building dead ahead! Thread the needle!
[soldier] Pull, pull!
[Sam] Come on, we're high enough! [Eddie] This is a mother getting up here!
translation.fr:
- On est assez haut.
- C'est galère !

translation.en: -[Epps] Get your fat ass over here! -I'm coming.
Set up the rocket! They're coming.
translation.fr:
Charge la roquette. - Ils arrivent.
- Inventaire !

translation.en: [Lennox] Weapons status?
29 Bot-busters, 20 piercing D-Bot.
There, the building with the dome.
For our brothers, let's make this trip worth it.
translation.fr: Pour nos frères... Qu'on soit pas venus pour rien.

translation.en: Oh, God.
-[soldier 1] The building! -[soldier 2] Oh, shit!
They're shooting at the building!
This is not a good idea.
translation.fr:
- C'est pas une bonne idée.
- Quoi ?

translation.en: -What? -This is not a good idea.
translation.fr:
- C'est pas une bonne idée.
- Quoi ? L'immeuble est instable.

translation.en: -This building is unstable. -Listen, stop for a second. If we don't do what we came to do, it doesn't matter, we all die.
translation.fr: Si on le fait pas, on y passera tous.

translation.en: Right? That's your target. Come on, man!
translation.fr:
D'accord ?
La cible est là. Allez !

translation.en: I don't even care if the building collapses. I'm having a heart attack anyway.
translation.fr:
L'immeuble peut s'écrouler,
j'ai déjà une attaque.

translation.en: The building is going over!
-Hang on! -Take cover!
[Epps] Keep your hands up!
It's okay! It stopped!
Guys, look!
-[soldier] Incoming, incoming! -[Epps] Everybody hide!
[whispers] Don't move.
[Epps] Go, go.
Run!
Cover fire!
[Epps] Shoot the glass! Jump out the window!
translation.fr: Pétez les vitres ! Sautez par les fenêtres !

translation.en: [Sam] Jump!
[soldier] We're gonna die!
[Carly] Sam, I can't stop!
Shoot the glass!
Sam! Sam!
No, no, no!
Is everybody okay?
[Sam] You okay?
What the hell was that?
-This evil thing's looking at me! -What?
translation.fr: Le vilain machin m'a repéré. Quoi ?

translation.en: It's even got an uglier Decepticon with it!
translation.fr:
Y a un Decepticon
encore plus moche !

translation.en: We have to evac!
Sergeant Epps, the stairs are blocked! [soldier] We're trapped!
translation.fr:
- Les escaliers sont bloqués.
- On est coincés.

translation.en: Okay. How do we get out of here? Hey! Come on!
translation.fr:
Comment on sort de là ? - Viens.
- Non, non. Oh, mon Dieu.

translation.en: Oh, Lord Jesus, let me just get out of this alive.
translation.fr:
- Viens.
- Non, non. Oh, mon Dieu. Je veux m'en sortir ! Je serai un type bien.

translation.en: Move! We got to move!
Why do the Decepticons always get the good shit?
translation.fr: Ils ont toujours les meilleures armes !

translation.en: Move! We're about to be eaten, people!
Give me your hand!
-I'm swinging that way! -[Hooch] Got her!
[Carly] Oh, my God!
translation.fr:
- Je la tiens !
- Oh, mon Dieu !

translation.en: [Sam] I'm dropping you on the fire escape!
translation.fr: Je te lâche sur l'échelle de secours.

translation.en: Whoa! We gotta move!
I'm coming for you!
Wreckers! We're coming!
Decepticons around the world,
launch the pillars.
[Wheelie] We are so lost!
[Brains] Always left out.
Ka-ching!
It's time to lay down the law.
About to bring some hurt now.
[Sam] It's starting! You see it?
Look out!
Where are Sam and Carly?
We'll go this way.
I give you one thing to do, one thing to do, and you drop the ball on that?
translation.fr:
Je te donne un seul truc à faire
et tu le foires ?

translation.en: I ain't signed up for all this! Got aliens blasting at me, running around, chasing me!
translation.fr:
J'ai pas signé
pour me faire courser par des aliens !

translation.en: I'm ducking through churches, and buildings, and all that kind of crap! This is bullshit! I ain't signed up for this, Epps.
translation.fr:
On rampe dans les églises
et les immeubles, c'est n'importe quoi !

translation.en: I'm trying to keep it together.
-What a treat! You and me, alone! -Carly!
translation.fr: Génial. Toi et moi, face à face. Carly !

translation.en: Come on, come on! Run!
Okay. He's after me, not you.
Run!
You can't hide, boy!
translation.fr: Tu ne pourras pas te cacher.

translation.en: I just love it when your little insect feet try to run!
translation.fr: J'adore regarder vos pattes d'insectes essayer de courir.

translation.en: -Sam! -Run!
I thought you were working for us, boy?
translation.fr: Tu ne travailles plus pour nous ?

translation.en: No! Sam!
My eye!
My eye!
Target the Decepticon!
[Carly] Sam!
Please, you've got to save Sam!
-You've got to save him! -What the hell is he doing?
This better work.
D-Bots! D-Bots!
I can't see! I can't see!
It's on my hand! Grab the knife! Knife!
-I'm trying! -Knife, knife, knife, knife, knife!
The bomb's gonna blow! The bomb's gonna...
translation.fr:
- J'essaie !
- Coupe, coupe, coupe, coupe ! Oh, mon Dieu ! La bombe va...

translation.en: You human scum!
-We got 20 seconds on that bomb! -What bomb?
translation.fr:
- La bombe laisse 30 secondes.
- Quelle bombe ?

translation.en: You see that bomb?
Cut it, cut it, cut it! [Lennox] I got it!
How long do we have?
[Starscream] I'm gonna kick you!
I'm gonna kill--
Well, he's dead.
Hey, Bee's going to run with the rest of the Autobots -and meet us at the edge of the river. -All right.
translation.fr:
Bee arrive avec les Autobots,
on les rejoint.

translation.en: [Wheelie] It sucked me in. There was nothing I could do.
translation.fr: Il m'a aspiré, j'ai rien pu faire !

translation.en: This is a total cluster...
We got to get across the river.
translation.fr: Il faut qu'on passe le fleuve.

translation.en: You see that? She said the control pillar -was in that first cupola. -All right.
translation.fr:
Le pilier de contrôle
est dans la première coupole.

translation.en: Let's go! Move! Let's move!
[man, on radio] Tomahawks are inbound.
ETA: 20 minutes.
I'm in the traffic cameras.
[man] Four Autobots are captured.
[Mearing] Oh, my God. We're helpless.
Whatever's set to happen, with those pulses getting faster, it's gonna happen soon.
translation.fr:
Je sais pas ce qui se prépare,
mais ça s'accélère, ça va pas tarder.

translation.en: [man] No sign of Optimus.
[Lennox] How do we get these bridges down?
Spread out. Check in there.
Epps, I've been looking for your ass. How you doing?
Retirement is wack. Even worse,
translation.fr:
La retraite, c'est pourri
et en plus...

translation.en: we can't get across the river to that building, and the Autobots are upstairs, surrounded.
translation.fr:
on peut pas accéder à l'immeuble
où les Autobots sont encerclés.

translation.en: Just pan the camera around, all right?
All right. Pan... Pan right. That's you.
Try getting into the bridge control room.
translation.fr:
Essaie d'accéder
aux commandes du pont.

translation.en: [Mearing] What are they doing? They're just standing there.
translation.fr:
Qu'est-ce qu'ils ont ?
Ils ne bougent pas.

translation.en: Hang on. Dutch, see if you can hack into the bridge.
translation.fr:
Attendez. Dutch... Essaie de cracker
la commande du pont.

translation.en: [soldier] Sir, SEALs are here.
It's a good day, boys! What do you got?
Got a ten-man SEAL unit, sir, tasked with vectoring Tomahawks.
-How long? -Fifteen.
[Soundwave] You're my prisoners! Take it easy. We surrender.
translation.fr:
- Vous êtes mes prisonniers.
- Du calme. On se rend.

translation.en: [Autobot] Get off me.
[Lennox] All right, you're gonna need your 40 Mike-Mikes and your frags.
translation.fr:
Prenez les lance-grenades
en mode auto.

translation.en: The vibrations jack up their circuits. Snipers, shoot for the eyes.
translation.fr: Les vibrations niquent leurs circuits. Tireurs, visez les yeux.

translation.en: All right, your target is up on top of that building, that cupola.
translation.fr: La cible se trouve sur cette tour.

translation.en: How doomed you are, Autobots.
translation.fr: Le sort s'acharne sur vous, Autobots.

translation.en: You simply fail to understand
that the needs of the many outweigh the needs of the few.
translation.fr:
que la multitude passe avant
quelques individus.

translation.en: Activating the bridge.
They happy about something.
We're in the heart of their ship.
translation.fr: On est au cœur du vaisseau.

translation.en: Let's give 'em a little ride.
[laughs] We gonna screw this ship up.
[Dutch] It's a 128K binary encryption code.
translation.fr: C'est un code binaire de 128 ko.

translation.en: It's difficult.
But not for me. I'm in. Bridge down.
translation.fr: Sauf pour moi. Je l'ai. Pont abaissé.

translation.en: The bridge is coming down! Someone's watching over us!
translation.fr:
Le pont descend !
On a un coup de main !

translation.en: Come on! Let's go!
"Pleasure working with you, Seymour,"
I believe you're supposed to say.
translation.fr: C'est ce que tu devrais dire.

translation.en: Good job, Dutch.
[Ratchet] Get off me!
[Roadbuster] Hurry! They're triggering the pillars!
Prisoners? You're keeping prisoners?
Yes.
You need to teach them about respect.
translation.fr: Il faut leur apprendre le respect.

translation.en: This was all business, but now it's personal, do you understand me?
I understand. No prisoners, only trophies.
translation.fr:
C'est normal. Pas de prisonniers,
ce sont des trophées.

translation.en: Bee, I think they're going to kill us.
translation.fr: Je crois qu'ils vont nous tuer.

translation.en: -You, your time is up. -Wait, wait, wait!
We surrendered! We're your prisoners.
translation.fr:
On s'est rendus !
On est des prisonniers !

translation.en: -Move it! -Can't we talk this out?
translation.fr:
Bouge. On pourrait discuter,
entre gens raisonnables...

translation.en: We're all a bunch of good chaps! I mean you no... Ugh!
translation.fr:
On pourrait discuter,
entre gens raisonnables...

translation.en: Why did you--
Goodbye, my old friend.
You're mine now.
Get off me!
-I got to help him. -What?
What are you doing?
-I got to help him. -Sam, you can't help him.
translation.fr:
- Il faut que je l'aide.
- Tu ne peux pas !

translation.en: Sam!
Turn around.
We... We gave 'em a hell of a run.
We did it, Brains! We did it!
Rip this ship apart.
-We had a nice run, Brains, you and me. -Yeah, we gonna die.
translation.fr:
- On en aura vu !
- Oui, on va mourir.

translation.en: Come on.
Whoa, whoa, whoa! Okay, baby! You all come with us!
translation.fr:
Allez. Waouh, waouh !
OK ! Venez avec nous !

translation.en: [Lennox] Go! You guys, follow that ground team! Go!
[Lennox] Epps, third floor! We're going to 45!
All right. Two snipers, right here!
All right, dock up!
We jump in three minutes!
Set up shop right here.
Set up.
I'm downstairs.
We got five targets and Shockwave right below us.
translation.fr:
Cinq cibles plus Shockwave
juste en dessous.

translation.en: Stand by to jump!
All right, let's go! Get ready, get ready.
Snipers, take out their eyes.
-[groans] -All right, demo team, let's crank steel.
Turning steel!
Don't fire till I tell you!
Good job, kid!
Fire!
-We got him! -Yeah!
He's on the run!
Autobots, attack!
Mortar that bridge!
It's our world now!
translation.fr: Ce monde est le nôtre, désormais.

translation.en: Commence transport!
Oh, my God. Oh, my God.
Optimus!
Gah!
You die! Hyah!
No!
[Optimus] Get down here, Sentinel!
you forget your place!
I bring you Cybertron, your home...
and still you choose humanity.
translation.fr: et tu choisis malgré tout l'humanité.

translation.en: You were the one who taught me freedom is everyone's right.
translation.fr:
C'est vous qui m'avez appris
que chacun a droit à la liberté.

translation.en: I will retrigger that pillar!
Then you'll have to go through me!
translation.fr: Pour ça, il faudra me passer dessus.

translation.en: Okay, I've got to try and help. -I have to. You stay here. -Don't you go. Don't go.
translation.fr:
Il faut que je l'aide.
Il le faut. Reste ici.

translation.en: You're gonna be fine, okay? I promise. I got to get to that pillar.
translation.fr:
Ça va aller. Je te le promets.
Je vais au pilier.

translation.en: Charge the pillar!
We got Autobots!
[Sentinel] Reinforcements!
Decepticon ships, fire at Optimus!
We're taking fire! I need those Tomahawks now!
translation.fr:
On essuie des tirs.
J'ai besoin des Tomahawks !

translation.en: [man, over radio] First wave inbound.
We've got to cover for Optimus!
Decepticons, trigger the pillar!
Restart that pillar!
Trigger the pillars.
I can't hold them! The ships have us pinned!
translation.fr:
Je ne peux pas les retenir !
On est coincés par les vaisseaux.

translation.en: No!
[soldier] Inbound, ten seconds! Danger close!
Mark-Lima-Echo-Echo, 14250!
Positive surface contact.
-[man] Target I.D. -Target acquired.
Dylan! Wait!
Shit! Dylan!
Stop! Stop!
You can't do this, okay?
There's only one future for me.
translation.fr: Un seul avenir s'offre à moi.

translation.en: Cybertron, you are saved, at last.
Oh. Have you come to surrender?
-Was it all worth it? -Obviously.
translation.fr:
- Ça en valait la peine ?
- À l'évidence.

translation.en: All your work to bring Sentinel back, and now clearly he has all the power.
translation.fr:
Vous avez fait revenir Sentinel
et maintenant, il dirige.

translation.en: It's actually almost tragic.
You dare lecture me, slave?
translation.fr: Tu oses me faire la leçon, esclave ?

translation.en: Your Decepticons finally conquering this planet, and yet, their leader won't be you!
translation.fr:
Les Decepticons l'emportent
et vous n'êtes plus leur chef.

translation.en: It will be me! It will always be me.
translation.fr: C'est moi, leur chef ! Ce sera toujours moi.

translation.en: In any minute now,
you'll be nothing but Sentinel's bitch.
translation.fr: vous ne serez plus... que le clébard de Sentinel !

translation.en: [Hooch] Rocket!
You chose sides?
You chose wrong.
[Sentinel] Always the bravest of us!
translation.fr:
Toujours le plus courageux
d'entre nous.

translation.en: But you could never make the hard decisions!
translation.fr:
Mais désarmé
devant les choix difficiles.

translation.en: Our planet will survive.
No!
We were gods once. All of us.
translation.fr:
Nous étions des dieux, avant.
Tous !

translation.en: -But here... -Please!
translation.fr:
- Mais ici...
- Je vous en prie !

translation.en: ...there will only be one!
[Megatron] This is my planet!
I just saved a whole other world.
You think you're a hero, huh? You think you're a hero?
translation.fr: Et tu te prends pour un héros ?

translation.en: No. I'm just a messenger.
The pillar's still connected!
[Epps] Bring it up!
-Bee! Let's do this! -[Lennox] Let's go, let's go! Move, move!
Pillar's still connected!
[Roadbuster] Rip that pillar down!
Now, we need a truce.
All I want is to be back in charge.
translation.fr:
Tout ce que je veux,
c'est reprendre ma place.

translation.en: Besides,
who would you be without me, Prime?
translation.fr: qu'est-ce que tu deviendrais, sans moi ?

translation.en: Time to find out.
Optimus, all I ever wanted was the survival of our race.
translation.fr:
Je n'ai jamais voulu
que la survie de notre espèce.

translation.en: You must see why I had to betray you.
translation.fr:
Tu dois comprendre
pourquoi j'ai dû te trahir.

translation.en: You didn't betray me.
You betrayed yourself.
No, Optimus!
Sam.
I love you.
I love you.
You're the only thing I need in this world, and I'll do anything to make it up to you, I promise.
translation.fr:
Je tiens trop à toi.
Je ferai tout pour me faire pardonner.

translation.en: I'm going to hold you to that.
Just never let me go.
I promise.
[Carly] Ooh. Rings.
I love this car.
-Bee, you've got to slow it down. -[laughing]
You got to slow way down, okay?
I'm just trying to help out.
[Optimus] In any war,
there are calms between storms.
translation.fr: il y a des accalmies entre les tempêtes.

translation.en: You fought bravely.
There will be days when we lose faith.
translation.fr: Il se peut que nous perdions la foi,

translation.en: Days when our allies turn against us.
But the day will never come that we forsake this planet
translation.fr:
mais jamais
nous n'abandonnerons cette planète

translation.en: and its people.
That's what I call the start of a beautiful future.
translation.fr:
C'est ce que j'appelle
la promesse d'un bel avenir.

translation.en: -Arrest him. -[laughs]
-It was worth it! -Get him out of here!
I'd go to jail for love! I don't care!
translation.fr:
- Sortez-le.
- J'irais en prison, par amour !

translation.en: Go ahead, take me in! I want to go in! Let's go in.
translation.fr:
Allez, jetez-moi en prison !
Je veux y aller.

translation.en: Come on, Charlotte, take me in right now!
translation.fr:
- J'ai un excellent avocat.
- Mettez-moi en prison !
